top_attributes.product_long_description:
Simply Baby Metro Crib Bedding:
  • Includes a comforter Secure-Me modular bumper dust ruffle and sheet
  • Contemporary twist for a fresh nursery look
  • Soft and cozy comforter features a plush velboa center panel and corduroy bias and border
  • Secure-Me 4-piece bumper with a total of 24 pairs of ties to help the bumper fit securely to most cribs
  • Bumper is 10" high and has printed 100% cotton fabric on one side that reverses to soft plush velboa with corduroy bias and ties
  • Crib sheet is 100% cotton
  • Dust ruffle has a 14" drop with a pleated front/back detail
  • All printed fabrics are soft 100% cotton 200 Thread Count plush fabrics are 100% polyester

top_attributes.product_short_description: A contemporary twist for a fresh nursery look the Simply Baby Metro Crib Bedding Set is available in both pink and blue and has a full range of coordinating accessories for a complete decorator look. This metro 4-piece crib bedding set is a great choice as it helps to finish off your childs nursery in a unique way. The set includes a comforter dust ruffle sheet and a secure-me modular bumper. Each item features a similar contemporary design ideal to suit your kids room. The comforter in the pink or blue crib bedding set is very soft and cozy. The 10 high bumper has 24 ties so that it can be perfectly fitted in the crib. All the printed fabrics included in the metro 4-piece crib bedding set are made from 100 % cotton with 200 thread count to offer the utmost comfort for your baby whereas the plush fabric uses 100 % polyester for extended durability.

top_attributes.product_name: Fisher-Price Rainforest Friends 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set

top_attributes.product_medium_description: The Fisher-Price Rainforest Friends 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set makes a fun and playful addition to a girl's or boy's nursery. It features a brightly colored design and is adorned with sweet jungle animals including a monkey giraffe elephant and more. This vibrant Fisher-Price crib bedding set includes a comforter with dimensional details crib sheet dust ruffle and appliqued Secure-Me modular bumper. The bumper has a four-piece design that allows it to fit a convertible or a standard size crib with solid panels or wide slats. Additional ties are included with this Fisher-Price Rainforest bedding set to secure the bumper.

top_attributes.product_short_description: The Fisher-Price Rainforest Friends 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set makes a fun and playful addition to a girl's or boy's nursery. It features a brightly colored design and is adorned with sweet jungle animals including a monkey giraffe elephant and more. This vibrant Fisher-Price crib bedding set includes a comforter with dimensional details crib sheet dust ruffle and appliqued Secure-Me modular bumper. The bumper has a four-piece design that allows it to fit a convertible or a standard size crib with solid panels or wide slats. Additional ties are included with this Fisher-Price Rainforest bedding set to secure the bumper.

top_attributes.product_long_description:
Rainforest Friends 4-Piece Crib Set
  • Fisher-Price Rainforest bedding set includes:
    • Appliqued comforter with dimensional details
    • Dust ruffle
    • Crib sheet
    • Appliqued Secure-Me modular bumper
  • Due to the challenge of securing a bumper guard to convertible and standard size cribs with solid panels or wide slats the Secure-Me modular bumper is 4 separate pieces with a total of 24 pairs of ties
  • Additional ties allow the bumper to fit securely to most cribs
  • Comforter dust ruffle and bumper are 55% cotton and 45% polyester exclusive of decoration
  • Sheet is 100% cotton
  • Features a vibrant design and an assortment of sweet jungle animals

Quality Tested for Walmart
These items have gone through rigorous safety and product testing.

top_attributes.shelf_description: <LI>Appliqued Comforter <LI>Appliqued Secure-Me Modular Bumper<LI>100% cotton sheet

top_qna: Does the sheet have elastic all around or just in the corners?
Just the corners
elastic all around
The sheet does not have any elastic in it. Only the fitted sheet does.
The sheet has elastic all around.
I bought this crib sheet a year ago and mine has elastic all around. I'm sure it is still made that way.
What color would go with this?
I would say a sage green or light brown.
Green blue yellow and brown are the colors I used when painting my son's letters for his name. I painted his name in a light green then used blue yellow and brown polka dots.
Tans & greens would both work well. Depending on if you are using this for a boy or a girl you could also do blue accents or yellows.
where could i purchase the valance and diaper stacker shown in the picture? Also is there a wall paper border available for this set?
both of those items can also be purchased through walmart.com
I purchased everything from Walmart.com. Maybe it is out of stock but they should be back soon. Kmart or Sears might have it online.
The valance and diaper stacker are available on Walmart.com. There is not a wallborder to coordinate.
Does this fit a 28 X 52 crib mattress?

Yes the crib sheet does fit a 28X52 crib mattress. I have the Colgate Classica II mattress which is that size and it fits perfectly. Just make sure you either put the sheet in the dryer on low heat or hang dry it. I put my sheets on low heat and it is fine.
Yes it fits all standard crib mattresses (28x52")
Yes

product_name: George Baby - Avalon 4-Piece Crib Set Blue
question: Where do I find the rug to go with the product that is in the picture?

I love the bed and the bedding set..title: Great Bedding Set
I love the bed and the bedding set..content: It is very soft and fuzzy. I wouldn't waste your money on the higher bedding sets at babies r us or anywhere else. I feel in love with this bedding set when i found out i was having a boy. I have two older children at bought their bedding sets at babies r us. I think i got ripped off because for one this bedding set is cuter than my other sons and two it cost $250 less. I am 35 weeks pregnant so my son hasn't been able to sleep in his new bed yet due to him not here but i bet he sleeps just as good as my other kids did with their high priced bedding sets. Also if you are a expecting mother and getting a new baby bed i recommend a dark color baby bed. I bought the Graco - Lauren 4-in-1 Convertible Classic Fixed Side Crib, Espresso and it matches perfectly with the bedding set. I love the bed and the bedding set. Both are great products. Would recommend both of them.

Both the comforter and the bumper pad co.title: Wonderful Purchase!
Both the comforter and the bumper pad co.content: I just love this crib set! The pattern is so adorable and perfect for a baby boys room. My son loves the soft plushy fabric. Both the comforter and the bumper pad come in soft fabric. I plan on purchasing the entire George Baby Avalon room decorations.Bottom line, its a great value! It doesn't look cheap. Do not waste your money on an expensive brand like say "BabiesRUs". If your looking for something cute and affordable then this is EXACTLY what you need! ;]

I've also purchased all of the matching.title: EXCELLENT Crib Set!!
I've also purchased all of the matching.content: I'm a 'researcher' by nature - I look up, analyze, and compare products with just about anything I plan to buy, not only so that I am confident I got the best price, but also, for the satisfaction of knowing of all that is out there, I got exactly what I wanted. So, doing the same when it came to planning all of my son's purchases prior to his birth was just a given. I searched around at just about every retailer and ended up IMMEDIATELY falling in love with this bedding set. I wanted something blue, of course, and I also love the fact it is distinctly modern and elegant looking - it really does look like an expensive, quality set. Let me just say, I have looked at all the crib bedding at high-end establishments such as Babies R Us, and was NOT impressed. This set was just great - both in aesthetics AND quality. It feels plush, soft, and just wonderful for my little boy to sleep in. He hates ever being away from home (such as his trips to grandma's) because he enjoys his own comfortable bed so much..which I attribute to both his mattress and especially, this bedding. I've also purchased all of the matching accessories which I plan to put to good use soon after our new home is finished being remodeled and I can set up his nursery in the new place. However, for now..it STILL is absolutely amazing. I would recommend to anybody. Just hoping they still have it around (in possibly pink) for when I have another baby...LOVE it!!!

top_attributes.product_name: George Baby - Avalon 4-Piece Crib Set Blue

top_attributes.product_long_description:
George Baby Avalon 4-Piece Crib Set Blue:
  • Blue crib set includes comforter bumper pad sheet and dust ruffle
  • Plush comforter with embroidered details and polysuede trim
  • 4-sided bumper pad made of soft velboa; reverses to 100% cotton sheeting; box-style detailing; measures 10" high
  • 200-thread-count printed sheet is 100% cotton; fits standard-size 28" x 52" crib mattresses
  • Dust ruffle with 14" long drop
  • Coordinate this set with other accessories from the Avalon Collection (sold separately)

top_attributes.product_medium_description: Dress up your child's bed and make it more comfortable with the George Baby Avalon 4-Piece Crib Set. Included is a comforter for added warmth for nighttime a bumper pad for going around the inside for safety and an extra sheet. There is also a dust ruffle for added decoration and concealing the area beneath the mattress. The colors and designs of this baby crib set coordinate with other George Baby Avalon nursery items (sold separately).

top_attributes.product_short_description: Dress up your child's bed and make it more comfortable with the George Baby Avalon 4-Piece Crib Set. It remains to be seen whether several wa.title: Sweet gender-neutral bedding

top_attributes.product_short_description: Little monkeys will be in good company with the Maddox Monkey 10-piece Crib Bedding Set. This 10-piece nursery bedding set offers everything you need to create a darling space for your baby. Super soft and durable blends of cotton and polyester make up the pieces in this set and you'll love having everything you need from the reversible quilt to the mix & match crib sheets to the mobile. Each piece is wonderfully crafted with exceptional details and appliques bringing soothing blue colors and soft textures into the nursery.   About Pam Grace Creations Pam Grace Creations was created by Pam Val a loving wife and mother of four in January of 2006. Pam had seven years of experience in the baby bedding and nursery decor industry from working with her sister to run their own baby product business. She brought this experience and knowledge of the industry to her own company and Pam Grace Creations was born.   Pam is committed to providing new parents a combination of style affordability and convenience and to that end she created her Nursery-to-Go 10 piece baby bedding sets. These sets include everything parents need to outfit their new baby's room in a range of styles and color palettes at an affordable price--without having to hunt down their nursery items piece by piece. (PGC012-1)

top_qna: Does the fitted sheet fit smaller matresses (like 23.6 x 47.2)?

Hi Monika This sheet is designed to fit a standard crib matress which measures 28" x 52". It is fully elasticized but I\'m afraid would still be loose on a smaller matress. It\'s important that it fit the mattress snugly so for that reason I would not recommend this sheet for your mattress. Thank you
The fitted sheet measures 28" x 52" and is not adjustable.
Coordinating sheets?
I'm sorry but there are currently no additional sheets in the Child of Mine by Carter's Treetop Friends collection.

There is absolutely nothing we don't lik.title: Very Happy Mommy and Daddy!!
There is absolutely nothing we don't lik.content: Being a first-time expecting mommy, I just couldn't stand the sight of my son's bare crib. At first, my fiance and I had decided to look for a sports themed set. After a month or so of being disappointed in what options we had found, we decided to be open for whatever that was reasonably priced. Walmart immediately came to mind since I'd seen this set there before and hadn't forgot about it. We went and purchased this right away with few reservations but decided to give it a try. I thought it'd probably look girly and was prepared to take it back if need be. I was wrong!! The bedding would work perfectly for girl OR boy!! The colors are soft and neutral, emphasised with bold and bright colors as well. Soft, colorful animals adorn the comforter. The bumper is easily kept in place with six sets of two ties, one set at each corner and another set in both back and front. There is absolutely nothing we don't like about this product and I'd DEFINATELY recommend it to anyone!! We can't wait until our little bundle of joy gets here and falls in love with it as much as we have!!

We can't wait until our little bundle of.title: Very Happy Mommy and Daddy!!
We can't wait until our little bundle of.content: Being a first-time expecting mommy, I just couldn't stand the sight of my son's bare crib. At first, my fiance and I had decided to look for a sports themed set. After a month or so of being disappointed in what options we had found, we decided to be open for whatever that was reasonably priced. Walmart immediately came to mind since I'd seen this set there before and hadn't forgot about it. We went and purchased this right away with few reservations but decided to give it a try. I thought it'd probably look girly and was prepared to take it back if need be. I was wrong!! The bedding would work perfectly for girl OR boy!! The colors are soft and neutral, emphasised with bold and bright colors as well. Soft, colorful animals adorn the comforter. The bumper is easily kept in place with six sets of two ties, one set at each corner and another set in both back and front. There is absolutely nothing we don't like about this product and I'd DEFINATELY recommend it to anyone!! We can't wait until our little bundle of joy gets here and falls in love with it as much as we have!!

I wanted an alternative to a sports set.title: I wish there was more to go with this set!
I wanted an alternative to a sports set.content: I love the soft colors & sweet look of the animals! I wanted an alternative to a sports set for a boy till he's older! :) I am really dissapointed in the lack of accessories! The mobile online looks cheap & doesn't even match & from one of the reviews I read someone agrees! Unless you're artistic like one lady who painted pictures to match you're kinda stuck. Idk I'm gonna search the web maybe Carters has something? wish me luck!

top_attributes.product_medium_description: Keep your kids happy with theￂﾠBedtime Originals Champ Snoopy 4-Piece Baby Crib Bedding Set. It features the snoopy dog cartoon playing a variety of sporting activities upon this comfortable baby bedding that keeps your baby always smiling. This crib bedding set comes in a soft yet masculine color palette of blue cream and russet accompanied by gingham and stars. This crib features a compact design which makes it ideal even for space-conscious rooms. It includes a lightweight quilt/comforter a coordinating bumper pad which ties to fasten it to crib railing a crib skirt (or dust ruffle) and a matching fitted sheet. The bumper protects the baby from bumping on the sides of the crib. It is easy to clean as you just have to machine wash and tumble dry this bedding set.

I do love the quilt with the different f.title: VERY CUTE
I do love the quilt with the different f.content: I read a lot of good reviews on this set, and I liked that it was bright, but not so much that it was too loud and tacky. When it came, I was VERY pleased with it! I do love the quilt with the different fabrics. While the baby won't be able to use it at first, I think it will still look nice on a chair in the room until he can. The only reason I didn't give "value" all 5 stars is because the crib sheet does feel quite starchy, but I'm hoping that few washings will soften it up... I was expecting it, though, because I'd already read about it in other reviews. I also liked that the bumpers were actually long enough to wrap around the perimeter of the crib, whereas another set I'd seen the bumpers were just too short to make it all the way. Very cute set, and good quality, as far as I can see!

I bought the matching blanket and musica.title: LOVE IT
I bought the matching blanket and musica.content: i love this bedding set. its way better in person. we painted my bedroom a tanish color so it would match my stuff and my sons stuff. his bedding set is perfect for the price and for the style. On many other sites its way more! i just overall love this product! I bought the matching blanket and musical mobil also to go along with it. love those too!my son is not here yet, hes the only thing missing to a great package!

I really am pleased with the crib set, i.title: Sport Crib Set
I really am pleased with the crib set, i.content: I really am pleased with the crib set, it is exactly as it appears in the picture and worked well with the sports theme of my son's room.

I did notice that I had to wash the shee.title: I love this product!!
I did notice that I had to wash the shee.content: This is mine and my husbands 4th child and I know that paying $200 for a crib set isn't worth it. This being our third boy we wanted a different theme then with our other boys and I couldn't believe how hard it was to find a cute sports bedding until I found this one. I love the price of this bedding and everything that goes with it. I was very happy when I got the set it was just like the picture. I hate the baby looking crib sets I wanted something he could use as a baby and still be able to use as he becomes a toddler and this works awesome for that! It is cute without over doing it. I did notice that I had to wash the sheets a few times over and use softener on it to get them soft but I've found that you have to do that with most of these kind of crib set. I love the colors in this set. I had also purchused the lamp, wall border, sheets, mobile, and valance and I love having the whole matching set. It looks great and works great for my lil man!

I hate the baby looking crib sets I want.title: I love this product!!

I hate the baby looking crib sets I wanted something he could use as a baby and still be able to use as he becomes a toddler and this works awesome for that! It is cute without over doing it. I did notice that I had to wash the sheets a few times over and use softener on it to get them soft but I've found that you have to do that with most of these kind of crib set. The only reason I didn't give \"value\".title: VERY CUTE
The only reason I didn't give \"value\".content: I read a lot of good reviews on this set, and I liked that it was bright, but not so much that it was too loud and tacky. When it came, I was VERY pleased with it! I do love the quilt with the different fabrics. While the baby won't be able to use it at first, I think it will still look nice on a chair in the room until he can. The only reason I didn't give "value" all 5 stars is because the crib sheet does feel quite starchy, but I'm hoping that few washings will soften it up... I was expecting it, though, because I'd already read about it in other reviews. I also liked that the bumpers were actually long enough to wrap around the perimeter of the crib, whereas another set I'd seen the bumpers were just too short to make it all the way. Very cute set, and good quality, as far as I can see!

top_qna: I would like to buy the Bedtime originals super sports 4pc set. I would like to purchase the matching wall border shown in picture. Cannot find it?
Order it online that's what I did : )
Is the sheet that comes with the set a fitted sheet or do i have to purchase one.
Yes it was fitted
Yes it's a fitted sheet.
Yes it comes with 1 fitted sheet so I purchased an extra one ($14.97 on walmart.com). Or you can buy just a plain white baby blue or green sheet for cheaper.
I bought this set but i want the matching diaper stacker and I can't find it?
They might have it at target if I'm not mistaking
Is the fabric pure cotton? Is it soft?
It's 55% cotton 45% polyester. It's not super soft but it's soft enough. It's a good buy for summertime.
yes
It's polyester and yes its soft.
Can I buy just the dust ruffle(bed skirt)? That's the only piece I need.
I don't believe you can.
no its a whole set
Can this bedding set be used with any crib/mattress?
Yes
All crib mattresses are the same size. Toddler mattresses are the same size as well. So yes they are all the same size and will fit anything.
Can I order an extra sheet?
Yes I did the same so my niece could have an extra sheet for bed changes.
Yes they are $14.97 here on Walmart.com for 1 extra sheet.

Also, the dust ruffle does not seem to f.title: Poor quality
Also, the dust ruffle does not seem to f.content: While cute in person, I washed all the bedding before putting it in our crib. The bedding came out looking pretty worn after only one washing, but the thing that got me the most upset was the dust ruffle. The fabric that goes under the mattress had melted some in the dryer (and we didn't have it on a high temp) and then pulled apart in multiple spots creating huge holes in the fabric! I purposely got this set because it came with a dust ruffle. Also, the dust ruffle does not seem to fit our standard crib as well as it is shown in the picture. It could be that it shrunk in the wash, too, or is now smaller because of the fact the fabric is stuck together now. It was very disappointing because I really wanted to love this set!

The pictures can't do justic to the text.content: This crib bedding set exceeded my expectations. The pictures can't do justic to the textures and colors of the fabric. I would recommend this crib bedding set to anyone. Don't think that becuase it's a lot less expensive that those found in those high priced specialty stores that you are not going to get a quality product.

The only downside I thought is the sheet.title: Awesome Nursery Bedding &Decor
The only downside I thought is the sheet.content: This set exceeded our expectations when it arrived! The colors are vivid and the quilt is very nice quality and super soft. The quilt comes with a space in the back of it to hang it on the wall which is nice because I was going to hang it anyway (since quilts and bumpers aren't safe in cribs) but having a quilt hanger on the back was very convenient. The wall hangings are so cute too. The only downside I thought is the sheet that comes with the set is not very soft but I think after washing and drying it will be softer. I would definitely buy this set again!

I would recommend this product for anyon.title: Love It!!!

I would recommend this product for anyone looking for something to grow with their baby. I simply love it.

I know I do..title: Beautiful Bedding

The colors are not as bright as in the p.title: Worth the price!!
The colors are not as bright as in the p.content: I bought this for my first born after looking all over for an affordable nursery bedding set. I am not a fan of anything too "Baby" and wanted a modern set up that was gender neutral. I looked all over the internet, and this set was the most affordable, and appeared to have the greatest value- 4 pieces vs 3. I set it up as soon as it came in, and I liked it a lot. The colors are not as bright as in the picture, the material feels a bit cheap, and the comforter is very light weight with minimum fill in it- FYI. Though the colors are muted, they are still very nice. Definitely wait to paint until you get it set up! Overall, I'm happy with it for the price that I paid.

Others said that the colors weren't as b.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
Others said that the colors weren't as b.content: I absolutely love this bedding. I was alittle worried about it since I read some of the other reviews, but when I got it, I was MORE than pleased! Others said that the colors weren't as bright as they looked on the screen, but I thought they were pretty true to the picture. I wasn't expecting, nor did I want, a lime green...I got just what I was looking for! I can't wait for my little boy to be able to use it! Some other reviews even said that "you get what you pay for" and that the quality isn't all that great, but I think it's wonderful! I have felt many other friend's sets that feel just as comfortable and thick as this one, so I don't know what everyone else is talking about! I don't EVER buy anything by just looking at it online, but I had looked and looked and couldn't find anything I liked. I didn't want a themed bedding, and I wanted green, so this fit perfectly. I was okay with ordering this online this time because I knew if I didn't like it, I could take it back to the store and for the price, what did I have to loose! NOTHING! Like I said, it far exceeded my expectiations! I can't wait to finish the room now!

I have felt many other friend's sets that feel just as comfortable and thick as this one, so I don't know what everyone else is talking about! I don't EVER buy anything by just looking at it online, but I had looked and looked and couldn't find anything I liked. I didn't want a themed bedding, and I wanted green, so this fit perfectly. I was okay with ordering this online this time because I knew if I didn't like it, I could take it back to the store and for the price, what did I have to loose! NOTHING! Like I said, it far exceeded my expectiations! I can't wait to finish the room now!

I looked all over the internet, and this.title: Worth the price!!

top_qna: were can i find the musical mobile thats in the picture?
Because the set it on clearance the mobile is no longer available at Walmart.
It used to be on here but I don't think its sold anymore. I didn't buy it when I bought the bedding & got back on to buy it & couldn't find it.
is the sheet that comes with the set fitted or flat?
fitted
it is a fitted sheet
What are the measurements of the dust ruffle?
24.5"x 48.5" under the matress and then a 12-13" hanging down from that.
What specific items come with the set? (Bumper crib sheet comforter?)
Bumper crib sheet comforter and dust ruffle
Does the fitted crib sheet have elastic all around?
No it is just at the narrow ends and on the corners.
No it is just a flat crib skirt
In what country is this product made?
Made in China
will this bedding fit on a mini crib?
the sheets fit perfectly on a regular size crib mattress. Its probably a safe bet not to try to use too large of sheets on a smaller mattress for safety reasons.

top_qna: I bought the sumersault 4 piece crib set and it came without thw dust ruffle... what do I do now?
If you are missing the dust ruffle you contact Walmart and have them send you the missing piece OR you contact the maker of the set and have them send you the missing piece.
I want a matching twin bedding

Honestly I would order this in your case! It should be very easy to coordinate with twin bedding. Plus it is very unisex. I just purchased the entire collection. If you are looking for a coordinating set - look at the Circo Stripe Bedding Brown at Target.com under the boys bedding. Pair it with a fire engine red bedskirt pick up the Blooming Delights accent pillow and a red pillow sham and viola! you have a well coordinated bedding set. I would look at the Blooming Delights valance as well and pair it up with red chino panels for window dressings. Best of Luck! LovinMeSomeWalmart
I don't have ideas for the twin bedding however this item has been on clearance for over 3 months now so you should be fine

My only negative comment is the depiction of the bumper in the photo (set is only available on line in my area). The photo shows the bumper as plaid, but the plaid side is the same side that the pictures are on and actually belongs facing in toward the baby. The other side of the bumper is a solid chambray blue with red plaid ties. I've taken a couple of pictures to show what it looks like on a crib.

top_attributes.product_name: Sumersault - Aloha Patchwork Boy 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set

top_attributes.product_short_description: Decorate a baby's room while making it more comfortable with the Sumersault Aloha Patchwork 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set. Included is a reversible comforter with a plaid pattern on one side and a patchwork with a variety of patterns and images on the other. There is also a matching crib sheet bumper and a dust ruffle for added decoration. These are machine washable for easy care and made of polyester and cotton. This Sumersault crib bedding set coordinates with other items in the Aloha Patchwork collection (sold separately).

top_attributes.product_long_description:
Sumersault Aloha Patchwork Boy 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set:
  • Boy crib bedding set includes reversible comforter and bumper a charming dust ruffle and a crib sheet
  • Fabric: 100% cotton
  • Filling for bumper and comforter: 100% polyester
  • Care: machine wash; tumble dry

top_attributes.product_medium_description: Decorate a baby's room while making it more comfortable with the Sumersault Aloha Patchwork 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set. Included is a reversible comforter with a plaid pattern on one side and a patchwork with a variety of patterns and images on the other. There is also a matching crib sheet bumper and a dust ruffle for added decoration. These are machine washable for easy care and made of polyester and cotton. This Sumersault crib bedding set coordinates with other items in the Aloha Patchwork collection (sold separately).

I am very happy with the colors and the.title: very happy with the bedding
I am very happy with the colors and the.content: I ordered this for my second son. He is due to arrive June 2014, there for we have not used the bedding yet. I am very happy with the colors and the package that comes with every I needed for the nursery. I will not have to buy anything else for his room but a lamp and a laundry basket. The colors are brighter then shown in the pictures. I love all the cute animals. The only thing i was surprised at was that the wall hangings are cloth with two loop holes on the back to hang them with, but they can be hung with a couple pin nails for each. I plan on getting some wall stickers to match the bedding. I'm so excited to be getting the room ready for our newest family member.

top_attributes.product_name: Sumersault - Noah's Ark 10-Piece Nursery-in-a-Bag Crib Bedding Set

top_attributes.product_medium_description: Welcome home your new arrival with this adorable comfy and cozy crib set designed in inviting warm blue aqua gold and brown tones. The quilt features a colorful animal ark panel print in the center of the quilt surrounded by a beige "animal spots" print fabric with contrasting chocolate binding. The reverse side of the quilt has a subtle design: a white circle on gray print fabric. The set comes with two fitted crib sheets each featuring a different print. One sheet is a white circle on a gray print and the second sheet is a bright and charming animal print pattern. The dust ruffle is designed with the cozy beige "animal spots" print a single inverted pleat on each long side and a 13-inch drop. Each wall hanging features a colorful animal face motif. The window valances are designed with an adorable animal ark scene. The mobile has four hangings; each with a different happy animal motif and trim.

top_attributes.product_short_description: Welcome home your new arrival with this adorable comfy and cozy crib set designed in inviting warm blue aqua gold and brown tones. The quilt features a colorful animal ark panel print in the center of the quilt surrounded by a beige "animal spots" print fabric with contrasting chocolate binding. The reverse side of the quilt has a subtle design: a white circle on gray print fabric. The set comes with two fitted crib sheets each featuring a different print. One sheet is a white circle on a gray print and the second sheet is a bright and charming animal print pattern. The dust ruffle is designed with the cozy beige "animal spots" print a single inverted pleat on each long side and a 13-inch drop. Each wall hanging features a colorful animal face motif. The window valances are designed with an adorable animal ark scene. The mobile has four hangings; each with a different happy animal motif and trim.

top_attributes.product_long_description:
Noah's Ark 10-Piece Crib Bedding Set:
  • Made of poly-cotton fabrics
  • Features adorable design in gender-neutral colors
  • Includes:
    • Quilt: 44" x 35"
    • 2 fitted sheets fit standard crib mattresses
    • Dust ruffle fits standard crib mattresses and features 13" drop
    • 3 wall hangings: three 11" squares
    • 2 window valances: 44" x 15" with 3" tab top
    • Mobile
  • Care instructions:
    • Machine wash color with like colors; use only non-chlorine bleach
    • Tumble dry low; warm iron if needed
    • Mobile spot clean only
  • Imported

Questions about product recalls?
Items that are a part of a recall are removed from the Walmart.com site and are no longer available for purchase. These items include Walmart.com items only not those of Marketplace sellers. Customers who have purchased a recalled item will be notified by email or by letter sent to the address given at the time of purchase. For complete recall information go to Walmart Recalls.

top_attributes.product_medium_description: Your baby can sleep comfortably with the Pam Grace Creations 3pc Crib Bedding Set. This Pam Grace bedding features two fitted sheets that will fit snugly against your baby's portable crib mattress. The sheets of this sky blue bedding set fit a standard crib mattress. This set also comes with a quilt that features a sky blue center and is accented with a rich brown tan and sky blue border. The tranquil colors and contemporary style of the 3pc crib bedding set will coordinate well with virtually any decor that you have in your baby's nursery. The quilt provides plenty of room for your baby to stretch out or grow. The Pam Grace Creations 3pc Crib Bedding Set is made out of 35 percent cotton and 65 percent cotton exclusive of decoration. This makes the Pam Grace Bedding soft against your baby's skin. It will also keep your baby warm while taking naps during the day and sleeping for the night.

top_attributes.product_medium_description: The Bacati Camo Air Nursery-in-a-Bag Crib Bedding Set includes a comforter a four-piece bumper pad a fitted sheet a crib skirt a window valance a diaper stacker a musical mobile and three wall hangings. The comforter is reversible one side is embroidered with planes and stars other side is printed stars in blue green beige and navy colors. The bumper pad in this 10-piece crib bedding set is embroidered with planes and stars on one side and solid beige on the other with wide ties to create wonderful bows. The crib sheet has a camo print in beige/navy/green colors and has reinforced corners and elastic all around for a secure fit. The window valance in this baby crib bedding set with stars printed fabric is wide enough to fit most windows.

top_qna: Is this pillow suitable for side sleepers?
Yes this pillow is suitable for side sleepers.
Is this pillow just feathers or is it a combination of feathers and down. Does anyone know what the ratio is for example 80%feather 20% down.
Fill ratio is 50% down 50% small 5cm feathers
Why do reviews love this pillow when one is bought but when the set of two are purchased It isn't liked?
The diameter is about 18 inches but the are soft and comfortable so they conform to your neck
Is it "squishable"?

When I first got the pillow it was quite puffy and not that squishable - so much so I only used one pillow (I normally use two. However after about three weeks the pillow is perfect and has figured me out! I am now using two. They squish nicely when sleeping but you can puff them back up easily too. I like them A LOT.
I like the same feature which is why I returned these pillows. Too firm for squishing.
Is the package completely sealed?
Yes this pillow comes completely sealed in a polybag.
Is there a smell to pillow and is shell noisy when lying on pillow.
I didn't notice any smell but it is too noisy for me.
This is a 100% Cotton Quilted shell and is not noisy. There will be a slight order that will dissipate after a few days.
How long before I start getting poked with quills?
In three weeks I have only had one feather come out the side binding. I noticed it while making the bed

I'm just amazed that a synthetic stuffin.title: Remarkable Product
I'm just amazed that a synthetic stuffin.content: I quickly bought one of these for a short stay at a relatives home last year.    I went to this product for the low price and the product reviews.   I was really surprised when I first used it.    I have down pillows at home and they have seen better days.    These are amazing.    I ordered 2 more for my home.   They are supposedly identical to the single one that I purchased last year but felt more firm than what I was expecting.    I think that they 'loosen up' a bit after use as they are now fantastic.   I'm just amazed that a synthetic stuffing can be this good.   Thrilled and sleeping a bit better.   I am very happy with the product.   No one can argue about the value and they are delightfully comfortable too!

I LOVE this pillow..title: The most supportive pillow
I LOVE this pillow..content: I suffer from leg pain. This pillow has actually helped a great deal by keeping the spine aligned correctly, therefore no pinching of the syiatic nerve. This pillow supports my neck and is so soft and comfy. You feel like your sleeping on feathers and the pillow bounces back to shape. I sleep like a baby. I LOVE this pillow.

i will have to look for roomier pillow c.title: fluffy
i will have to look for roomier pillow c.content: nice pillows. my head sinks into the pillow and they are very comfortable. i have only had them for a few weeks but they hold their fluffiness and i seem to sleep deeper and longer than with other pillows. my only complaint, and it may be trivial, is that they are too large for the pillow cases. they slip out at the end of the case and are hard to stuff back in. i will have to look for roomier pillow cases. otherwise, they have been well worth the $27 plus tax. i wanted to rate them at 4-1/2 stars but there was no option for that. very good pillows. i would buy them again.

top_qna: is the filling loose or is it a solid piece?
The filling is loose and can easily be fluffed and positioned to help you sleep comfortably.
Does this pillow get softer and easier to "sqush" after it\'s slept on for a while?
It is so soft when it first arrives I can not imagine it getting any softer.

A little. It does break in but it's still relatively thick/puffy. It never squishes down as far as a real down or some of the thinner down alt pillows I've slept on but for me that works better actually.
What color is on the middle strip of the Beautyrest Luxury Dreamessence Pillow?
The cording is gold.
WOULD YOU CONSIDER THESE AS "FIRM" OR "SQUICHEY"??
It comes that way & no support whatsoever. My flat pillow (which became flat after years) was still better.
my daughter says they are squishy
Somewhere in between but closer to firm than squishy.
Squishy very very soft it might work if you sleep on your back.
Squishy and very fluffy when squeezed in your arms against your body this one squeezes down to very thin but it is very thick and fluffy.

I'm just amazed that a synthetic stuffin.title: Remarkable Product
I'm just amazed that a synthetic stuffin.content: I quickly bought one of these for a short stay at a relatives home last year.    I went to this product for the low price and the product reviews.   I was really surprised when I first used it.    I have down pillows at home and they have seen better days.    These are amazing.    I ordered 2 more for my home.   They are supposedly identical to the single one that I purchased last year but felt more firm than what I was expecting.    I think that they 'loosen up' a bit after use as they are now fantastic. I think that they 'loosen up' a bit afte.content: I quickly bought one of these for a short stay at a relatives home last year.    I went to this product for the low price and the product reviews.   I was really surprised when I first used it.    I have down pillows at home and they have seen better days.    These are amazing.    I ordered 2 more for my home.   They are supposedly identical to the single one that I purchased last year but felt more firm than what I was expecting.    I think that they 'loosen up' a bit after use as they are now fantastic.   I'm just amazed that a synthetic stuffing can be this good.   Thrilled and sleeping a bit better.   I am very happy with the product.   No one can argue about the value and they are delightfully comfortable too!

they slip out at the end of the case and.title: fluffy
they slip out at the end of the case and.content: nice pillows. my head sinks into the pillow and they are very comfortable. i have only had them for a few weeks but they hold their fluffiness and i seem to sleep deeper and longer than with other pillows. my only complaint, and it may be trivial, is that they are too large for the pillow cases. they slip out at the end of the case and are hard to stuff back in. i will have to look for roomier pillow cases. otherwise, they have been well worth the $27 plus tax. i wanted to rate them at 4-1/2 stars but there was no option for that. very good pillows. i would buy them again.

Beautyrest used to make one a bit more firm called "BR For Back and Side Sleepers", which was a super nice pillow, but apparently they discontinued it.   I tried to order it off of a famous on line website, and although it was advertised as the original back and side sleeper, both vendors sent me this pillow set ranging from $49.99 to $79.99, depending on the vendor.  Save yourself some time and money and just order the BR Luxury Power Extra Firm Pillow set from Walmart.   You will love this set of pillows and cannot beat the price at $22. Don't know if this happened during shipp.content: I thought I had found the prefect latex pillow at a very reasonable price, BUT, I was very disappointed! First of all, the pillow itself inside the zippered cover was slightly damaged. It was a little torn in a few places. Don't know if this happened during shipping or not. Second, the ODOR WAS SO STRONG it will knock your socks off!! I put it outside in the sun & breeze for more than a week. Then I tried dusting it lightly with baby powder (as I found on the internet as a solution). Still strong odor. Put it back outside for another week. Thought it was some better so I made the mistake of bringing it in and trying to sleep on it. STILL STRONG ODOR! Was also too high & too firm. For anyone with neck problems or has had neck surgery, like I have, please be careful. It is just too high for proper neck alignment, especially if you have a rather short neck. The packaging, pillow itself, zippered cover were all just fine. Shipping speed was amazing. It just is not the pillow for me.

The material just won't allow for manipu.title: Fabulous!
The material just won't allow for manipu.content: This latex pillow is different from most which people are used to. The pillow comes with a thin cover which is more of a cover to protect the integrity of the pillow. It's not really a pillow cover. I bought separate covers. I bought the same pillow some years ago & as all pillows do over time, mine broke down & it was time to buy a new one. This pillow is firm & would be well suited for the heavy person or person with broad shoulders. It is not a flimsy pillow like traditional cotton pillows so it doesn't "wad up" at all. Don't expect to crunch this pillow into a ball. The material just won't allow for manipulation of it. It holds its form for years! I literally only replaced my last one due to the fact that the material started to break down & got crummy. This pillow does not allow for bed bugs & does not smell bad over time. It has little holes for ventilation which you cannot feel when laying on the pillow. I think this is the best pillow I've ever used & I've found it to be very supportive.

Order 2 so you have a better chance of g.title: Not enough filling
Order 2 so you have a better chance of g.content: The pillow is great when it comes with enough filling. I order them often and half the time they're not fully filled. Order 2 so you have a better chance of getting a properly filled one.

If you are one to sweat around your neck.title: Boomerang Pillow
If you are one to sweat around your neck.content: This is my second purchase. Walmart had such a great price compared to other online stores. I love this pillow. I sleep on my side and also like a pillow to hold on to. This takes care of both those needs. What I don't like about the pillow is it doesn't have like a zippered pillow protector that you can zip off and launder. It does come with one pillow case that is just ok. White and nothing fancy. If you are one to sweat around your neck area or drool the pillow does start staining. I have washed the pillow a couple times but it still seems slightly yellowed. I thought I read where it was to be just spot cleaned but no way. So here is the other thing I don't like is it's hard to find pillow cases. Walmart sells them but are out of all the colors except white. There are some for sale on Ebay but from Austrailia and the shipping is ridiculous. I wish I could find a reasonable priced seamstress to make me a pillow protector and a pillow case.

Upon looking inside the zipper, it was a.title: medium-firm pillow
Upon looking inside the zipper, it was a.content: I ordered a previous Simmons Beauty Rest pillow, and it matched the mixed reviews: the 1st one was too soft. I didn't even take it home, but returned it immediately. Upon looking inside the zipper, it was a "Standard 2" - meaning, it was a standard size foam pillow with "2" firmness. The pillow actually folded over when I picked it up. Online, it was listed as "firm." I read better reviews on this particular pillow. I opened the zipper case when I arrived @ the store, and it was a "standard 3" - and it did not immediately fold over when placed on my arm. This one isn't what I would call "firm," but it does provide better support along with the nice, wonderful 'spongy' pillow feeling

That pillow is the most comfortable pill.title: Stop looking!

In the last month I bought three different pillows trying to replicate the comfort of my wife's pillow, and I am happy to report that I finally found the same pillow my wife has  and I have been sleeping like a 42-year-old baby.  Not only did I find the right pillow but at Sears this pillow would cost over $150. In Amazon it will cost me over $50. In Walmart.com I found this king size latex pillow for a little over $35.  I recommend the pillow and I definitely recommend Walmart.com to find anything for a better price!

Latex is natural by definition. "Foam" is synthetic latex -- and no matter what they say memory foam etc. will not be as firm as latex.

I have read on sites that have consumer rated latex pillows that the well rated Beautyrest latex pillow is a blended Talalay latex. Unless it is stated 100% natural Talalay latex Talalay latex generally is a blend of 20% natural latex (from the rubber tree) and 80% synthetic latex produced by the Talalay method that makes an airy resilient foam. Percentages of natural to synthetic can differ with manufacturers. All Talalay latex is expensive to produce and there are only 3 manufacturers in the world who make it in the USA Netherlands and China.

Upon looking inside the zipper, it was a.title: medium-firm pillow
Upon looking inside the zipper, it was a.content: I ordered a previous Simmons Beauty Rest pillow, and it matched the mixed reviews: the 1st one was too soft. I didn't even take it home, but returned it immediately. Upon looking inside the zipper, it was a "Standard 2" - meaning, it was a standard size foam pillow with "2" firmness. The pillow actually folded over when I picked it up. Online, it was listed as "firm." I read better reviews on this particular pillow. I opened the zipper case when I arrived @ the store, and it was a "standard 3" - and it did not immediately fold over when placed on my arm. This one isn't what I would call "firm," but it does provide better support along with the nice, wonderful 'spongy' pillow feeling

Everything else is perfect about this pillow: latex, made in USA, price, shape, zippered case, minimal smell, 6" in height.It is too soft.  When I lay my head on it (I am 150 lb), the pillow compressed by about 4 inches (only supported my head to about 2 inches above the mattress).  It is OK for one night of sleep but not comfortable.  Obviously I cannot get enough support for sleeping on the side.  I will return this.  Too bad.  So close.Given there are so many 5-star reviews and some praised its firmness, I wonder if I have been given a reject product from the manufacturer's other product lines.

I bought these from a Matress store and.title: Best support pillow!
I bought these from a Matress store and.content: I bought these from a Matress store and let my parents try them and they insisted we buy them a set. They provide excellent neck support and all of us no longer wake up with kinks in our necks. You also don't have to toss and turn or flip a pillow or fold it in half ever again. The material is immediately resilient unlike the foam pillows out on the market today.

Two of the \"standard\" size fits our qu.title: LOVE. Like sleeping on a cloud.
Two of the \"standard\" size fits our qu.content: We slept on latex pillows at a family member's home and fell in love. We were so impressed, we got online and ordered these before we flew home. We've always loved softer down pillows and thought there was nothing better. We were wrong! This pillow is so soft -- you just sink into it, but it's springy and supportive enough for side sleeping. The zippered cover that comes with it is very nice quality. Two of the "standard" size fits our queen bed just fine. Great price, super fast shipping. Will never go back to down pillows! These are the best!

I remembered recently about the latex pi.title: Great pillow
I remembered recently about the latex pi.content: Years ago I owned a latex pillow and loved it. For a good many years I have been buying fiber filled pillows and no matter how much I pay for them, they all become lumpy and lifeless. I remembered recently about the latex pillow I used to have and found this one. I am very happy with it and am sleeping great now. Yes, it's a little pricey but it will last much, much longer than 5-6 fiber filled pillows. It keeps its shape, looks great on the bed and most of all gives me good head and neck support.

That pillow is the most comfortable pill.title: Stop looking!
That pillow is the most comfortable pill.content: My mother-in-law had given my wife a pillow that was very comfortable many many years ago.  That pillow is the most comfortable pillow we have ever found, but I could never find a pillow as comfortable as that one  because it did not have any markings or tags. In the last month I bought three different pillows trying to replicate the comfort of my wife's pillow, and I am happy to report that I finally found the same pillow my wife has  and I have been sleeping like a 42-year-old baby.  Not only did I find the right pillow but at Sears this pillow would cost over $150. In Amazon it will cost me over $50. In Walmart.com I found this king size latex pillow for a little over $35.  I recommend the pillow and I definitely recommend Walmart.com to find anything for a better price!

I have read on sites that have consumer rated latex pillows that the well rated Beautyrest latex pillow is a blended Talalay latex. Unless it is stated 100% natural Talalay latex Talalay latex generally is a blend of 20% natural latex (from the rubber tree) and 80% synthetic latex produced by the Talalay method that makes an airy resilient foam. Percentages of natural to synthetic can differ with manufacturers. All Talalay latex is expensive to produce and there are only 3 manufacturers in the world who make it in the USA Netherlands and China.

There are a plethora of chemicals in oth.title: Latex is the Way to Go
There are a plethora of chemicals in oth.content: Let me preface this by saying that I *NEVER* thought I would spend this much on a pillow.  Instead, I bought the $3 pillows and threw them out every 6 months or so because they'd be completely flat.  It's been about 6 years since I got my latex pillows and they are the same now as when I bought them.  They're actually going to save me money in the long run, even being as expensive as they are.In addition to the above, they are head and shoulders above (no pun intended) any other pillow I've tried.  It's like laying your head down on a cloud of heaven.  There's no waiting for the thing to warm up before it contours to your head like memory foam.  There are no lumpy areas or hard spots like traditional pillows.  It's not excessively hard like so many pillows are.  I frankly do not understand why they are not more popular as they are the best type of pillow made.This specific pillow is a mid-loft type and would work for a back or side sleeper.  If you're one of those weird stomach sleepers, you want something with a lower loft.  (Habitat Furnishings has a perfect one for you; I returned it because it was too low for me, being a side sleeper.)  Latex is a different feel, being springy and almost bouncy, but it's unbeatable once you get used to it.  It's also not hot like memory foam.I now sleep on an all-latex mattress and no longer have to take prescriptions for joint pain as it all went away when I got my bed.  Another benefit is that it's all-natural - basically, whipped and cooked tree sap.  There are a plethora of chemicals in other types of foam, many of which the government admits they don't know what effect expose has on humans.You really cannot beat the comfort, longevity, or price of this pillow.  WalMart made the buying process easy and easily beat the next lower retailer.  I was a bit hesitant to order, never having bought from walmart.com before, but it was smooth and simple.  I have spent over twice as much on another latex pillow in the past, but this one feels identical.  (I bought it for my father and tested it before giving it to him.)  If anything happens to my beloved latex pillows, I am coming back here to order replacements.

Will be buying another, my idea was to get a pillow that was as good as my old one which I have to pack with me everywhere. This will be staying at my winter home and the next one I get will be going back home with me. Thank you Simmons!

Obviously pillows come down to personal.title: Excellent product!
Obviously pillows come down to personal.content: I have been using a Simmons Beautyrest latex pillow for the last 12 years, and I got that one used from my grandparents. These pillows have approximately a 10-20 year life span in my experience. They provide excellent neck support while still having enough give to make it comfortbale. They are soft and bouncy, and the latex remains evenly distributed no matter what you do to the pillow, so it never gets lumpy or bent out of shape. The pillow stays cool at night, too, which I love. I did notice that the pillow took about 3-5 days to "break in" for me in comparison to my ancient one. During the break in period it was a little to "high", but it compacted in a few days and is perfect now.I tried all manner of other pillows before I was able to find this one at Walmart.com. Obviously pillows come down to personal preference, but if you want a firm, yet soft and springy pillow with good neck support and aren't a fan of the firmness of foam or the lumpyness of feathers/down and polyester/cotton then this is the pillow for you! The latex is excellent quality, other latex pillows I've tried and returned have had too much give at the expense of neck support and just FEEL flimsy. When this pillow finally does start wearing down, the latex inside will begin to crumble, but this won't be noticeable because it is inside a case and that case is probably in a pillow case. I'd just say check it in about 15 years. ;)

Don't know if this happened during shipp.title: Be Careful If You Have Neck Problems/ODOR
Don't know if this happened during shipp.content: I thought I had found the prefect latex pillow at a very reasonable price, BUT, I was very disappointed! First of all, the pillow itself inside the zippered cover was slightly damaged. It was a little torn in a few places. Don't know if this happened during shipping or not. Second, the ODOR WAS SO STRONG it will knock your socks off!! I put it outside in the sun & breeze for more than a week. Then I tried dusting it lightly with baby powder (as I found on the internet as a solution). Still strong odor. Put it back outside for another week. Thought it was some better so I made the mistake of bringing it in and trying to sleep on it. STILL STRONG ODOR! Was also too high & too firm. For anyone with neck problems or has had neck surgery, like I have, please be careful. It is just too high for proper neck alignment, especially if you have a rather short neck. The packaging, pillow itself, zippered cover were all just fine. Shipping speed was amazing. It just is not the pillow for me.

I have had the pillow over 2 weeks and t.title: Wow, what a pillow!
I have had the pillow over 2 weeks and t.content: Every day is a joy not to woke up with neck pain caused from a pillow! I ordered a standard size but wished I had ordered the queen. If you turn over at night like me, you will wish you had the extra pillow room. This pillow has a strong smell, but it's easy to get rid of with some extra strength Febreze spray! After giving the pillow a good coat of spray on both sides and allowing it to dry, the smell was completely gone! On the first night I could feel it supporting my head and allowing my neck muscles to finally relax. I got the best night sleep ever! I have had the pillow over 2 weeks and the smell has never returned. Well worth the money and the quality is excellent. I can see this pillow lasting me a long time. Highly recommend!

Instead, I bought the $3 pillows and threw them out every 6 months or so because they'd be completely flat.  It's been about 6 years since I got my latex pillows and they are the same now as when I bought them.  They're actually going to save me money in the long run, even being as expensive as they are.In addition to the above, they are head and shoulders above (no pun intended) any other pillow I've tried.  It's like laying your head down on a cloud of heaven.  There's no waiting for the thing to warm up before it contours to your head like memory foam.  There are no lumpy areas or hard spots like traditional pillows.  It's not excessively hard like so many pillows are.  I frankly do not understand why they are not more popular as they are the best type of pillow made.This specific pillow is a mid-loft type and would work for a back or side sleeper.  If you're one of those weird stomach sleepers, you want something with a lower loft.  (Habitat Furnishings has a perfect one for you; I returned it because it was too low for me, being a side sleeper.)  Latex is a different feel, being springy and almost bouncy, but it's unbeatable once you get used to it.  It's also not hot like memory foam.I now sleep on an all-latex mattress and no longer have to take prescriptions for joint pain as it all went away when I got my bed.  Another benefit is that it's all-natural - basically, whipped and cooked tree sap.  There are a plethora of chemicals in other types of foam, many of which the government admits they don't know what effect expose has on humans.You really cannot beat the comfort, longevity, or price of this pillow.  WalMart made the buying process easy and easily beat the next lower retailer.  I was a bit hesitant to order, never having bought from walmart.com before, but it was smooth and simple.  I have spent over twice as much on another latex pillow in the past, but this one feels identical.  (I bought it for my father and tested it before giving it to him.)  If anything happens to my beloved latex pillows, I am coming back here to order replacements.

Can this pillow be machine washed or is it "spot clean only"?
machine washed

I have owned latex foam pillows for years but never washed them. I would recommend spot cleaning for stains or to freshen them or kill germs after a recent sickness I put in the dryer on hot with a Bounce sheet for about 10 min. Supposedly the heat will kill any dust mites/germs and its does seem to freshen them. You might also contact a local dry cleaner to see what they recommend.
won't need to wash actual pillow just launder the zippered off cover as needed
spot clean only

He also would cry whenever he needed to.content: Started out nursing but as my supply diminished we began to use formula. We used Gentlease with our first so it was the obvious choice for our second baby, however we noticed he was extra fussy and irritable. He also would cry whenever he needed to move his bowels so we finally went to his pedi and she recommended we try the Nutramigen and it has made quite the difference in his moods and he's sleeping well at night as well as no more of the crying with every bowel movement.

top_attributes.instructions: Keep in dry place.Protect from heat.Instructions for preparation & use:Your baby's health depends on carefully following the instructions below. Proper hygiene preparation dilution use and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Powdered infant formulas are not sterile and should not be fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and supervised by your baby's doctor. Ask your baby's doctor which formula is appropriate for your baby. Ask your baby's doctor about the need to use cooled boiled water for mixing and the need to boil clean utensils bottles and nipples in water before use.1. Wash hands thoroughly with soap & water before preparing formula.2. Pour desired amount of water into the bottle. Add powder.3. Cap bottle and shake well.Use the chart below for correct amounts of water and powder. Use scoop in can to measure powder. Store dry scoop in this pouch.To Make** ... Water ... Powder.2 fl oz bottle ... 2 fl oz ... 1 unpacked level scoop (8.7 g).4 fl oz bottle ... 4 fl oz ... 2 unpacked level scoops (17.4 g).8 fl oz bottle ... 8 fl oz ... 4 unpacked level scoops (34.8 g).**Each scoop adds about 0.2 fl oz to the amount of prepared formula.Storage/handling: Store powder at room temperature; avoid extreme temperatures. Refill pouches can be used with reusable Enfamil Premium Gentlease tubs sold separately. After opening keep pouch or tub lid tightly closed store in a dry area and use contents within 1 month. Use tub with Enfamil Premium Gentlease formula only. Keep powder fresh and prevent bacterial growth by assuring tub is clean and completely dry. Completely empty tub and wipe clean with a clean dry cloth before refilling.

I have purchased this on October'2012 and the expiry date mentioned as Oct 2015.
What’s the differences between this product with the word (optiGRO) and early shield? i am very confused

Nothing exept if you buy Early Shield you're buying an outdated possibly old product. Similac claims to have reformulated their formula but I'm pretty sure that they just change the name every couple years to make it look like their product is always on the cutting edge and newly formulated. There really is no difference but I wouldn't buy Early Shield for the pure reason that it's older formula and may be expired.
where is the place of production about thisSimilac - Advance 1.45 lb. Infant Powder Formula 6-Pack?
Made in USA
how many months will this last?
There is an expiration date on the outside of the container for how long it will last unopened usually a year or so. Once it is opened it is recommended to discard any unused portion after 1 month.
How many liquid ounces does this product make?
I can get 20 8-ounce bottles from one container... With 1-2 scoops left over.
it makes 28 - 6 ounce bottles. So 168 ounces.
about 70 ozs per container
How many ounces does one 1.45 lb tub of prepared formula make?
On my package it says that 1 tub makes 28- 6 fl. oz bottles. So that's about 168 oz. total.
It makes 168 fluid ounces of formula.
I have not used powder formula before and my baby only drinks 2 ounces at one time. Does the scoop let you measure 2 ounces or is it bigger than that
Use one scoop per 2 ounces of water. Perfect for your baby.

The way it works is that you do 1 scoop for every 2 oz of water. It only gets more complicated when you do 3 oz (or other odd numbers) because then you have to estimate what half of the scoop is as there are no markings for a half scoop. Ex: 1 scoop for 2 oz 1.5 scoops for 3 oz 2 scoops for 4 oz etc.

top_qna: How long is the bottle good for once it's opened?

Great question Trayci! Once the 8 fl oz bottle has been opened and poured into your baby’s clean bottles both the formula in your baby’s bottles and any left in the 8 fl oz bottle should be refrigerated immediately and used within 2 days. If your baby doesn’t finish a bottle of formula within one hour throw it away. Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team

It is actually the highest priced formul.title: Total Comfort is absolutely wonderful
It is actually the highest priced formul.content: Our little one had a sensitive tummy from day one, and she needed a little help with digestion. We tried every sensitive formula we could find, tried non-milk based powders and still nothing helped. I happened to stumble upon Total Comfort while making a quick stop at the grocery store and immediately grabbed it. It works like a charm! The only cons of this product are these: it does not always mix well and can clog the bottles during feeding (easily fixed though), and the price is quite high. It is actually the highest priced formula I have seen on the market, but any price is worth a happy baby. Thanks, Similac! You made a great product that really works wonders.

top_qna: Do i need to refrigerate the bottle after opening? how long is it good for since opening the bottle first time?
Great question Diel! Once the 32 fl oz bottle has been opened it should be recapped and placed in the refrigerator and used within 3 days (as stated on the label). Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team
How long is product good once opened and how do you store it?
Don't know about the shelf life. But once it is opened it needs to be refrigerated.

Unopened bottles can be stored on the shelves for up to 1 year. After you open the bottle it must be refrigerated. You must use the opened bottle within 3 days. If you make a baby bottle the baby must drink it within 1 hour. After 1 hour you have to discard the milk. A baby bottle with the formula in it can also be refigerated for up to 24 hours and must be discarded after that. The instructions are on the back of the bottle and are very very clear. I really recommend this formula.
does six pack mean 6 bottles?
Yes.

6 Qt size bottles for a total of 6 qts yes I know when I checked online it said my local store didn't carry this by the case. When I went there it carried the singles for the same price as if I bought it in the case quantity. Hope this helps
YES
Yes!
Yes you refrigerate left over portions . Just be careful and try your best to feed it to your baby same day I refrigerated it no more then one day.
Yes
Is it ok to warm in bottle warmer after you refrigerate?
Yes it's ok to warm it up in a bottle warmer
How many bottles can you make out of just one quart?
I make 3 whole bottle but full...
what is different of read to feed or powder similac
Ready to feed means that it is ready to feed straight out of the container into a bottle while the powder has to be measured and then water is added to it to make the formula.
Ready to feed is liquid you do NOT add water to it you just need to warm it. Powder Similac you need to add water to it and then warm it.

top_qna: Can I mix this formula with breast milk??

In general infant formulas are generally designed to be used as an alternative to breast milk. If you don't have enough pumped breast milk for a full feeding feed your milk first and follow up with a bottle of formula. However if occasionally you want to mix breast milk and formula in the same bottle it would likely be okay as long as you follow the instructions on the label but check with your baby’s doctor to be sure! -The Similac Team

top_attributes.product_medium_description: Premature infants need special care and Similac NeoSure Ready-to-Feed is one way to make the task easier. It is specially formulated to provide the necessary nutrition to help little ones to prosper during their first year. Similac infant formula comes in a 1-quart bottle in a convenient pack of 6. It includes Lutein and DHA for eye and brain development; high amounts of protein vitamins and minerals; extra calories for growth and calcium and phosphorus to help support bone development. All of the nutrients included in this DHA baby formula help to ensure that babies born prematurely have every opportunity to catch up to full-term infants. It comes ready to use with a quick twist-off cap. There is no need to even add water measure or mix making this Similac NeoSure Ready-to-Feed formula convenient for busy parents.

top_qna: Do you heat up the neo sure after its refrigerated?
Yes you can warm the formula after it has been refrigerated.

Hi Jordi! Generally you don't have to warm the bottle because a lot of babies like it at room temperature or a little cooler. If you want to warm the bottle place it in a bowl of warm water or hold it under warm tap water. Shake the bottle gently and then test the temp making sure it's warm and not hot. Don't ever heat the bottle in a microwave because the formula can get hot really fast and burn your baby's mouth! Let us know if you have any other questions. ~The Similac Team
I pour the desired amount into a bottle then heat up only what's in the bottle.
Is this a 6 pack?
Yes
Do you have to refrigerate after opening ?
Great question! Once the 32 fl oz bottle has been opened it should be recapped and placed in the refrigerator and used within 3 days (as stated on the label). Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team
Yes it is recommended to refrigerate after opening. Read the directions.
How Many Bottles are there in a box ?
There are 6 one-quart bottles in this box.
How many bottles of Neosure come in a box?
Six

After about a week on the different gerb.title: Helped my baby so much!
After about a week on the different gerb.content: My 7 week old would scream non-stop. He was sooo colicky. He suffers from a lot of gas and when he passes it via bum or burp he seems to be in pain. I was up with him crying an average of 20 hours each day and was frantic to find something to help him feel better and be happy.I don't produce enough breast milk and had to supplement with gerber formula. Once on formula he started having trouble moving his bowels and was much fussier than before. After about a week on the different gerber formulas, he refused to drink them. I put him on probiotics which seemed to help him move his bowels but it didn't help with the crying and gas.I finally came across the reviews on here and saw several parents who were having the same problem with their babies and after starting similac sensitive, they said they had a new baby. My LO has been on it for a week now. It took about 72 hours, but he is sooo much happier. He cries only a normal amount now, he seems to be less gassy and when he passes gas it doesn't seem to hurt. I am so thankful for this formula. It gave me all that I wanted; a happy baby boy.

Do I need to dilute it with water?
Similac Sensitive Ready to Feed should not be mixed with water. Please be sure to follow the directions on the label for proper preparation and storage information. ~The Similac Team
How do you use this? Just twist on a nipple to cap like a bottle or do you pour into a separate bottle?

Once the 32 fl oz bottle has been opened formula should be poured into you baby's clean bottles and fed immediately. This 32 fl oz bottle should be recapped and placed in the refrigerator. Any formula inside this bottle should be used within 3 days (as stated on the label). -The Similac Team

Once the 32 fl oz bottle has been opened it should be recapped and placed in the refrigerator and used within 3 days (as stated on the label). Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team

After about a week on the different gerb.title: Helped my baby so much!
After about a week on the different gerb.content: My 7 week old would scream non-stop. He was sooo colicky. He suffers from a lot of gas and when he passes it via bum or burp he seems to be in pain. I was up with him crying an average of 20 hours each day and was frantic to find something to help him feel better and be happy.I don't produce enough breast milk and had to supplement with gerber formula. Once on formula he started having trouble moving his bowels and was much fussier than before. After about a week on the different gerber formulas, he refused to drink them. I put him on probiotics which seemed to help him move his bowels but it didn't help with the crying and gas.I finally came across the reviews on here and saw several parents who were having the same problem with their babies and after starting similac sensitive, they said they had a new baby. My LO has been on it for a week now. It took about 72 hours, but he is sooo much happier. He cries only a normal amount now, he seems to be less gassy and when he passes gas it doesn't seem to hurt. I am so thankful for this formula. It gave me all that I wanted; a happy baby boy.

top_qna: How many 1quart bottles are there?
They may or may not give you six bottles. Sometimes they will ship a single bottle and you will have to get a refund other times it is a case of six.
My order included only individual quart which required return for refund.
This is a package of 6 - 1 quart bottles.
Do I need to dilute it with water?
Similac Sensitive Ready to Feed should not be mixed with water. Please be sure to follow the directions on the label for proper preparation and storage information. ~The Similac Team
How do you use this? Just twist on a nipple to cap like a bottle or do you pour into a separate bottle?

Once the 32 fl oz bottle has been opened formula should be poured into you baby's clean bottles and fed immediately. This 32 fl oz bottle should be recapped and placed in the refrigerator. Any formula inside this bottle should be used within 3 days (as stated on the label). -The Similac Team
The premixed individual bottles how long can it stay out once it has been opened and not refrigerated?
Once the 32 fl oz bottle has been opened it should be recapped and placed in the refrigerator and used within 3 days (as stated on the label). Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team

top_attributes.product_medium_description: This Similac Sensitive Infant Formula is a wonderful choice for parents who have a baby with a sensitive tummy. This special formula will completely satisfy your baby's nutritional needs. This infant powder formula works to reduce fussiness and gas for your little one. The milk-based formula will help to soothe your baby's sensitive stomach relieving the discomfort that can at times accompany the accumulation of gas. It also helps to protect your child's immune system and it promotes brain and eye function and the development of strong bones. This infant formula with iron comes in a 12.0-oz can (pack of 6) for added convenience. To prepare it simply add water and serve to your baby. It is easy and takes only seconds. It is recommended that you use this formula during your child's first year. This is a kosher product.

top_attributes.warnings: Never use a microwave oven to warm formula.

top_attributes.product_short_description: Similac Sensitive Infant Formula is an easy-to-digest milk based formula designed for sensitive tummies. Our baby formula is a nutritionally complete formula designed for fussiness and gas due to lactose sensitivity and features OptiGRO our exclusive blend of DHA Lutein and Vitamin to help support your baby's overall growth brain eye and immune system development. Highly disappointed in the product as wh.title: Single use packets hard to open
Highly disappointed in the product as wh.content: Similac advertises that their single use packets are convenient to use. The packets are a pain to open unless you have scissors which let’s face it, at 3 am I don’t always have a pair of scissors laying around as well as when I am out and about. The little dotted line that they say to tear at is nearly impossible to rip open. I’d rather lug around the entire tub of formula instead of carrying around these “convenient” packets. Highly disappointed in the product as while my baby is hungry while out, I am struggling to find something to open this darn package. False advertising for sure.

Is this a 6 Pack or 8 Pack?
The pack of baby formula has 8 bottles in it.
Is this 6 boxes containg 8 bottles in each box?
This product is 6 packs of 8 bottles.

Estrella the Similac Advance 2 fl oz bottles are liquid and can be used as is with no mixing required. Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team

He been gaining the correct amount and t.content: We've been giving our son formula and breast milk  for a month now. He been gaining the correct amount and the formula sits good in his stomach. Don't plan to change formulas!

We had used premade from the time my dau.title: Daughter couldn't use powder
We had used premade from the time my dau.content: We had used premade from the time my daughter was born, we switched her to the powder to use our baby brezza and the powder made her super fussy and gsssy, she had a hard time pooping and caused her to spit up a ton. Back to premade we go!

My nurse gave me this formula at the hos.title: My baby boy loves it!
My nurse gave me this formula at the hos.content: I couldn't get my son to latch and I was so heartbroken when pumping wasn't working either. I wasn't making enough breast milk for him. My nurse gave me this formula at the hospital and he really liked it. He never spit it up and 3 months later he still loves it. I am so happy that I can give my baby a formula that agrees with him so well. I swear by Similac Pro-Advance.

After failing at breastfeeding, we tried.title: Great product
After failing at breastfeeding, we tried.content: My baby tolerates this formula very well and if I can't breastfeed him, I can atleast feel like I'm doing the next best thing for him. After failing at breastfeeding, we tried several different formulas and he does best on the pro advance. On the pro advance, he spits up less and his stool closely resembles what it was like when he was breastfeeding. My only complaint would be that I have a hard time finding it. The stores in my area are always out of stock, guess we're not the only ones that like it!
