top_qna: Infant versus Advantage: What is the major difference?

The Parent’s Choice Premium Infant Formula is a complete milk-based formula with prebiotics to support baby’s immune system and provide for the following nutritional information: • DHA & ARA • Beta-carotene and nucleotides • Iron fortified • Prebiotic (GOS) While the Parent’s Choice Advantage Infant Formula is a milk-based formula featuring galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS) a prebiotic found in breast milk and provides for the following nutritional information: • Prebiotics for immune system support • DHA & ARA • Iron fortified • Prebiotic (GOS) • Nucleotides • Lutein • 75 IU of Vitamin D

Parent’s Choice Advantage and Parent’s Choice Premium are milk based formulas which features a unique blend of nutrients to support growth and development including prebiotics which help support your baby’s immune system. These formulas are designed to provide complete nutrition for your baby first year 0-12 months. The Parent’s Choice Premium is comparable to Enfamil Infant. The Parent’s Choice Advantage is comparable to Similac® Advance® Early Shield. It is very important to pick the correct formula for your baby so we recommend that you speak with your Health Care Provider before choosing a formula. If you have any additional questions please call us at 800.410.9629 Monday through Friday 7:30am - 5pm ET.
What company produces this formula?
Parent's Choice Advantage Powdered Formula with Iron is manufactured by Parents Choice.
Is the Parents Choice Advantage NON-GMO in the Value Size? Or actually all sizes?
We currently make an Advantage non-GMO formula. This Advantage formula will have the non-GMO listed on the label.
Which formula is best and cheap for 14 months?

Hi thank you for your question. We offer a toddler formula [9 months and up] a next stage formula [12 months and up] and a next stage formula that is vanilla flavored [12 months and up]. We suggest speaking with your child's doctor to discuss formula options. Should you have any additional questions feel free to contact us back.
How much DHA and ARA is contained in this product (Advantage Powdered Formula)?
The Parent’s Choice Advantage formula contains 11mg/100Kcal of DHA and 20mg/100kcal of ARA.
Where was parents choice formula made?
The Parent’s Choice Advantage formula is manufactured in a certified formula plant in the United States.
Which Parents Choice formula compares to Enfamil Reguline?

Hi thank you for your question. We manufacture the Infant [yellow label] that compares to Enfamil infant and Gentle [purple label] compares to Enfamil Gentlease. Unfortunately at this time we do not make a formula that compares to Enfamil Reguline. Should you have any additional questions feel free to contact us back.
Is the Product available in lighter packs as i need to carry it when travelling abroad...

We make several size containers which are available online and in stores. Our smallest container for the Parent’s Choice Advantage would be a 658gram container. Please let us know if we can further assist you.
IF YOU ARE MAKING 1 QUART OF FORMULA (WATER) HOW MANY SCOOPS OF POWDERED FORMULA DO YOU NEED TOO ADD? A
You use one scoop of formula for every two ounces of water. A quart has 32 ounces in it so you would need 16 scoops. That must be one hungry baby.
How much sugar or frutose or any added sweetener is in this formula.Parents Choice Advantage with Iron Milk-Based Powder.
There is no added sugar or sweetners in the Parent's Choice Advantage formula.

top_attributes.instructions: Instructions for preparation & use:Your baby's health depends on carefully following the instructions below. Proper hygiene preparation dilution use and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Powdered infant formulas are not sterile and should not be fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and supervised by your baby's doctor. Ask your baby's doctor which formula is appropriate for your baby. Ask your baby's doctor about the need to use cooled boiled water for mixing and the need to boil clean utensils bottles and nipples in water before use.{1} Wash hands thoughly with soap & water before preparing formula.{2} Pour desired amount of water into the bottle add powder.{3} Cap bottle and shake well.Use the chart below for correct amounts of water and powder. Use scoop in carton to measure powder.Store dry scoop in pouch.To make# 2 fl oz bottle. Water 2 fl oz. Powder 1 unpacked level scoop (8.8g).To make# 4 fl oz bottle. Water 4 fl oz. Powder 2 unpacked level scoops (17.6g).To make# 8 fl oz bottle. Water 8 fl oz. Powder 4 unpacked level scoops (35.2g).#Each scoop adds about 0.2 fl oz to the amount of prepared formula.Warning:Do not use a microwave oven to warm formula. Serious burns may result.Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm. Once prepared infant formula can spoil quickly. Either feed immediately or cover and store in refrigerator at 35-40 degrees F (2-4 degrees C) for no longer than 24 hours. Do not use prepared formula if it is unrefrigerated for more than a total of 2 hours. Do not freeze prepared formula. After feeding begins use formula within one hour or discard.Storage/Handling:Store powder at room temperature; avoid extreme temperatures. Refill pouches can be used with reusable Enfamil Premium infant tubs sold separately. After opening keep pouch or tub tightly closed store in a dry area and use contents within 1 month. Use tub with Enfamil Premium infant formula only.Keep powder fresh and prevent bacterial growth by assuring tub is clean and completely dry. Completely empty tub and wipe clean with a clean dry cloth before refilling.Fragile handle with care.Keep in dry place.Protect from heat.Do not knife cut.

the burps) but if the smell is the one t.title: AMAZING, but Expensive
the burps) but if the smell is the one t.content: My son is almost 3 months old and I tried BF at first and couldn't due to medical issues of my own. As I was extremely worried about formula due to the food allergies and intolerances that run in the family I was skeptical about formula feeding. My Pedi told me about Nutramigen and it worked wonders for him! We tried Similac at first and it just made him gassy, fussy and constant crying! As soon as I switched you could see the difference from unhappy, hurting baby to happy, healthy and growing baby boy! It is pricy and it does have a not so pleasant smell to it (esp. the burps) but if the smell is the one thing I have to deal with for a happy, striving baby boy than it's a trade off I am willing to make!

Our family was distressed at the level o.title: Pain Relief for Baby AND Family
Our family was distressed at the level o.content: Our family was distressed at the level of tummy pain our sweet blessing was in, whenever she drank the regularly recommended infant formula. We thought that switching her to a soy-based formula, which worked well for big brother, would also be the solution for her. Her reaction to it was even worse! Mom and dad were exasperated and hurt to see her going through this at each feeding. Mom needed something to help support the low milk supply available from breastfeeding, so Grandmommy did some research and was amazingly blessed to find this solution. It seemed to soothe and satisfy immediately. Cost will not be allowed to pose an issue for us. It will be well worth every penny we have to spend to keep baby girl pain free and thriving.

top_qna: Do the ready feed bottles come with nipples that screw on top? if not what fits?

Hello Jess and thank you for choosing Enfamil A.R. for your little one! Our 8oz bottles of the Ready-to-Use Enfamil A.R. are re-sealable for convenience and not intended to be used as a feeding bottle. Rather it is intended to pour the desired amount into a separate bottle for feeding then cover and refrigerate the remainder for up to 48 hours. Look for Enfamil A.R. in our 2oz Nursette Bottles. Our Nursette Bottles are nipple-ready for easy feeding. Many standard or classic nipples available at retail will fit our Nursette bottles. I hope that this helps! -Ashley

It is really expensive, but as other rev.title: simply the best
It is really expensive, but as other rev.content: My almost 4 month old baby had troubles since day 9, she would start crying at 9 pm until 4 am every day. At 26 days they found she had acid reflux and milk protein allergy. We tried Nutramigen and it didn´t work, finally after 7 different formulas and a living hell trying to breastfeed our gastroenterologist suggested we tried PURAMINO (they started selling it in my country with that name only two months ago) before that there were not elemental formulas. So she´s been on Puramino since December and we´ve seen great results, she is a totally different baby, she went from bloody stools to a diaper a day; from vomiting after feedings to only spitting up; from crying a lot to smiling and sleeping well. She is gaining enough weight and reaching milestones as expected for her age, and we are super happy. It is really expensive, but as other reviewers think and express it is nothing compared to her wellness.

top_attributes.product_short_description: PurAmino is a hypoallergenic iron fortified amino acid-based infant formula used for infants and toddlers with severe cow's milk protein allergies and other food allergies.  It also is suitable for conditions such as protein maldigestion malabsorption/chronic diarrhea short bowel syndrome & eosinophilic esophagitis. It contains DHA & ARA important fatty acid nutrients that nourish brain and eye development for your baby. PurAmino can provide a sole source of nutrition for infants up to age 6 months and provide a major source of nutrition through 24 months of age when indicated. Normally in feeding infants gradual introduction of solid foods after 4–6 months of age is an important developmental as well as nutritional step. In cases of severe and multiple food allergies or intolerances PurAmino is sometimes continued as a milk substitute in the diet of children. This and similar supplemental use of PurAmino in the diet beyond 24 months of age may make a significant contribution to maintenance of good nutrition. PurAmino is created by the maker of Nutramigen—the #1 recommended brand* for managing infants who are allergic to cow’s milk protein‡.‡By pediatricians who recommend a specific formula.*Enfamil is the #1 pediatrician recommended brand of Infant Formula - QuintilesIMS using the ProVoice Survey fielded from October 1 2016 to September 30 2017.

top_attributes.ingredients: Corn syrup solids (48%) amino acids (L-aspartic acid L-leucine L-proline L-lysine hydrochloride L-alanine L-valine L-isoleucine L-threonine L-serine L-tyrosine L-arginine L-phenylalanine glycine L-histidine L-cystine L-tryptophan L-methionine) (18%) high oleic sunflower oil (10%) medium chain triglycerides (MCT) oil (9%) soy oil (8%) modified tapioca starch (3%) and less than 2%: Mortierella alpina oil* Crypthecodinium cohnii oil† choline chloride inositol ascorbic acid niacinamide calcium pantothenate riboflavin thiamin hydrochloride vitamin B6 hydrochloride vitamin D3 folic acid vitamin K1 biotin taurine vitamin E acetate L-carnitine vitamin A palmitate vitamin B12 calcium phosphate potassium citrate calcium citrate sodium citrate potassium chloride calcium hydroxide magnesium phosphate ferrous sulfate zinc sulfate cupric sulfate manganese sulfate sodium iodide sodium selenite.* A source of arachidonic acid (ARA).† A source of docosahexaenoic acid (DHA).

top_attributes.food_storage_tips: Powder Storage: Store cans at room temperature. After opening can keep tightly covered store in dry area and use contents within 1 month. Do not freeze powder and avoid excessive heat.

top_attributes.product_medium_description: The PurAmino DHA and ARA Hypoallergenic Enfamil Infant Formula Powder will give your little one the nutrition he or she needs. It is made for infants and toddlers with severe cow's milk protein and multiple food allergies. This amino acid based formula is nutritionally complete and contains what you need to ensure that your baby grows up strong and healthy. It is also powdered which allows it to be stored safely and for a longer period of time. All you need to do is add water when you're ready to serve it to your child. This Enfamil formula powder comes in a 14.1 oz can or in a pack of four (choose your size). It is also suitable for conditions requiring an elemental diet like protein maldigestion malabsorption/chronic diarrhea short-bowel syndrome and eosinophilic esophagitis. The PurAmino DHA and ARA Hypoallergenic Enfamil Infant Formula Powder will relieve your infant's tiny tummy troubles.

top_attributes.instructions: Keep in dry place.Protect from heat.Instructions for Preparation & Use:Your baby?s health depends on carefully following the instructions below. Proper hygiene preparation dilution use and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Powdered infant formulas are not sterile and should not be fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and supervised by your baby?s doctor. Ask your baby?s doctor which formula is appropriate for your baby.Ask your baby?s doctor about the need to use cooled boiled water for mixing and the need to boil clean utensils bottles and nipples in water before use.{1} Wash hands thoroughly with soap & water before preparing formula.{2} Pour desired amount of water into bottle. Add powder.{3} Cap bottle and shake well.Use the chart below for correct amounts of water and powder. Use scoop in tub to measure powder. Store dry scoop in lid holder.To Make# ... Water ... Powder.2 fl oz Bottle ... 2 fl oz ... 1 Unpacked level scoop (8.7 g).4 fl oz Bottle ... 4 fl oz ... 2 Unpacked level scoops (17.4 g).8 fl oz Bottle ... 8 fl oz ... 4 Unpacked level scoops (34.8 g).#Each scoop adds about 0.2 fl oz to the amount of prepared formula.Storage/Handling: Store powder at room temperature; avoid extreme temperatures. After opening keep lid tightly closed store in dry area and use contents within 1 month. Use tub with Enfamil Premium Gentlease formula only. Keep powder fresh and prevent bacterial growth by assuring tub is clean and completely dry. Completely empty tub and wipe with a clean dry cloth before refilling.

top_attributes.food_storage_tips: Warning: do not use microwave to prepare or warm formula. Serious burns may occur.Storage: Prepared formula that has not been used for feeding should be stored within 2 hours of preparation in the refrigerator at 35-40°F (2-4°C); use within 24 hours. Warm infant formula to room temperature and shake well before feeding. Store containers (opened or unopened) in a dry area at room temperature. Reclose the opened container tightly with plastic lid; use contents within 1 month. DO NOT FREEZE. Avoid any extreme temperatures. DO NOT USE IF INNER OR OUTER SEAL IS DAMAGED OR MISSING. DO NOT REUSE CONTAINER. USE BEFORE DATE ON BOTTOM OF CONTAINER.

top_attributes.food_preparation_tips: Directions for Preparation and Use: Your baby’s health depends on carefully following these preparation use and storage instructions. Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm. Ask your baby’s doctor about the need to boil or sterilize water for formula and the proper preparation of bottle and feeding utensils. 1. Wash hands bottle and feeding utensils in hot soapy water prior to preparing formula. 2. Pour desired amount of warm water (100°F/40°C) into clean bottle. (See feeding chart.) 3. Add powder to water. Return DRY scoop to slot located in the upper left corner of tub above the powder. 4. Cap bottle and shake well until powder is dissolved. Feed immediately. Discard any remaining formula in bottle after 1 hour from start of feeding. Important notice: Breast Milk is Best for Babies. Before using an infant formula ask the advice of your healthcare professional.

top_attributes.product_short_description: Compare to Enfamil A.R.® & Similac® For Spit-Up. All babies spit up some more than others. Added Rice Starch Baby Formula Powder with Iron is specially designed to help reduce frequency and volume of spit-ups while providing balanced complete nutrition for baby's first year. Our Triple Care® approach ensures a blend of nutrients for brain growth and immunity. Dual prebiotics promote baby's digestive health; also with Omega-3 fatty acid DHA naturally found in breast milk to support brain and eyes. Non-GMO ingredients. Certified Kosher by the Orthodox Union - (U)D. Enfamil A.R.® is a registered trademark of Mead Johnson & Co. Similac® is a registered trademark of Abbott Laboratories. Added Rice Starch Infant Formula is not made by or affiliated with Mead Johnson & Co. or Abbott Laboratories. Ingredients not genetically engineered. We put her back on the Gentlease..title: Will never buy this again
We put her back on the Gentlease..content: My LO was on similac advanced after I stopped nursing. She would cry everytime she would pass gas and she seemed to have a lot of gas build up so I talked to her ped. They recommended switching her to Enfamil Gentlease. The first two days were great but then all of a sudden my daughter went from going twice a day everyday to having hard sticky bowel movements. The occasional cry when passing gas turned into screaming everyday for hours on end and LOTS of gas build up. So the ped recommended switching her to Nutramigen. That went well for the first two days as well. I had a happy baby again and had regular bowel movements again. After two days on Nutramigen she started projectile spit up and it was very acidic. We put her back on the Gentlease. She only had three bottles of it and it already made her constipated and had BAD gas build up. We are back on Nutramigen, adding cereal and on Zantac. Needless to say a formula that is supposed to help with gas and fussiness only made it worse. Never will I buy again.

top_attributes.product_short_description: Introducing Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease. Our trusted Gentlease formula clinically proven to reduce fussiness gas and crying in 24 hours now has MFGM that nourishes the brain first. Emerging evidence from a recent clinical study showed MFGM in formula supports cognitive development similar to breast milk.* NeuroPro is the only formula that has a fat-protein blend of MFGM & DHA previously only found in breast milk.† So you can get brain-building nutrition inspired by breast milk from the formula brand that’s #1 recommended by Pediatricians. It offers complete nutrition for babies through 12 months easy-to-digest proteins and vitamins and minerals for immune health. Available in easy-to-grip 8 fl oz bottles that are ready to use without mixing or adding water. Simply attach baby’s favorite nipple.*As measured by Bayley-III cognitive score at 12 months in a different formula with MFGM added as an ingredient.†In amounts supported by clinical research.

Hello and thank you for choosing Gentlease for your little one. Nipples do not come with our Nursette Bottles. I hope that this helps! -Ashley
What is different between enfamil premium gentleeasy and enfamil gentleeasy

Hi Kici! Some of the ingredients in Enfamil Gentlease and Enfamil PREMIUM Gentlease Liquid may be from genetically engineered sources. Enfamil PREMIUM Gentlease Powder is a non-GMO* product. The product is good but my 1 year old ha.title: Good product but bad taste
The product is good but my 1 year old ha.content: The product is good but my 1 year old hates the taste,he doesn't like it any at all. I tasted it to see how it tasted and I don't like the taste either. My son prefers the regular Enfagrow Toddler

So the ped recommended switching her to.title: Will never buy this again
So the ped recommended switching her to.content: My LO was on similac advanced after I stopped nursing. She would cry everytime she would pass gas and she seemed to have a lot of gas build up so I talked to her ped. They recommended switching her to Enfamil Gentlease. The first two days were great but then all of a sudden my daughter went from going twice a day everyday to having hard sticky bowel movements. The occasional cry when passing gas turned into screaming everyday for hours on end and LOTS of gas build up. So the ped recommended switching her to Nutramigen. That went well for the first two days as well. I had a happy baby again and had regular bowel movements again. After two days on Nutramigen she started projectile spit up and it was very acidic. We put her back on the Gentlease. She only had three bottles of it and it already made her constipated and had BAD gas build up. We are back on Nutramigen, adding cereal and on Zantac. Needless to say a formula that is supposed to help with gas and fussiness only made it worse. Never will I buy again.

She would spit up all the time with Neur.title: This is great on the tummy!
She would spit up all the time with Neur.content: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Baby's pediatrician switched her formula to this, she was on NeuroPro, but the proteins were too harsh for her belly. She would spit up all the time with NeuroPro. We've had absolutely no problems with gentlease!

Now, he sleeps a lot more and is relaxed.title: So much more at ease!
Now, he sleeps a lot more and is relaxed.content: We started our second baby on Similac Advance since we used it with our 1st baby. It worked wonders for the first but was not good for our second baby. We then switched to sensitive and there was little change. My doctor suggested gentlease and withing a few hours we noticed a difference. His gas is way better and when he does have gas he releases it without screamng for 45 minutes. He has had loose stool since he was born and he still does, but he is so muc more at ease. He used to freak out in pain an hour and a half after ever bottle. Now, he sleeps a lot more and is relaxed.

top_attributes.product_short_description: Introducing Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease. Our trusted Gentlease formula clinically proven to reduce fussiness gas and crying in 24 hours now has MFGM that nourishes the brain first. Emerging evidence from a recent clinical study showed MFGM in formula supports cognitive development similar to breast milk.* NeuroPro is the only formula that has a fat-protein blend of MFGM & DHA previously only found in breast milk.† So you can get brain-building nutrition inspired by breast milk from the formula brand that’s #1 recommended by Pediatricians. It offers complete nutrition for babies through 12 months easy-to-digest proteins and vitamins and minerals for immune health. Available in easy-to-grip 8 fl oz bottles that are ready to use without mixing or adding water. Simply attach baby’s favorite nipple.*As measured by Bayley-III cognitive score at 12 months in a different formula with MFGM added as an ingredient.†In amounts supported by clinical research.

top_attributes.ingredients: Corn syrup solids (48%) amino acids (L-aspartic acid L-leucine L-proline L-lysine hydrochloride L-alanine monosodium glutamate L-valine L-isoleucine L-threonine L-serine L-tyrosine L-arginine L-phenylalanine glycine L-histidine L-cystine L-tryptophan L-methionine) (18%) high oleic sunflower oil (10%) medium chain triglycerides (MCT) oil (9%) soy oil (8%) modified tapioca starch (3%) and less than 2%: Mortierella alpina oil* Crypthecodinium cohnii oil† choline chloride inositol ascorbic acid niacinamide calcium pantothenate riboflavin thiamin hydrochloride vitamin B6 hydrochloride vitamin D3 folic acid vitamin K1 biotin taurine vitamin E acetate L-carnitine vitamin A palmitate vitamin B12 calcium phosphate potassium citrate calcium citrate sodium citrate potassium chloride calcium hydroxide magnesium phosphate ferrous sulfate zinc sulfate cupric sulfate manganese sulfate sodium iodide sodium selenite.* A source of arachidonic acid (ARA).† A source of docosahexaenoic acid (DHA).

top_qna: Does the package come with the nipples?
Nipples are not included in this package.

Hello and thank you for choosing Gentlease for your little one. Nipples do not come with our Nursette Bottles. Our bottles require a nipple that will fit over a threaded bottle width of approximately 1 1/2". Many standard or classic nipples available at retail will fit these Nursette bottles. I hope that this helps! -Ashley
What is different between enfamil premium gentleeasy and enfamil gentleeasy

Hi Kici! Some of the ingredients in Enfamil Gentlease and Enfamil PREMIUM Gentlease Liquid may be from genetically engineered sources. Enfamil PREMIUM Gentlease Powder is a non-GMO* product. (*Ingredients not genetically engineered. For more information visit Enfamil.com/nonGMO). Enfamil PREMIUM Gentlease has 24 milligrams of inositol compared to the 6 milligrams in Enfamil Gentlease to bring our new formulation closer to breast milk than ever before. Thank you for your interest in Gentlease! ~Nora
Does this product include nipple ?
No it does not include the nipple unit.
Is it for 1 month old infant?
Gentlease has complete nutrition for healthy growth during baby’s first year. Be sure to ask your child’s doctor if our Gentlease is right for your child’s nutritional needs. ~Nora

It seems like Abbott is discontinuing th.title: Ready to feed impossible to find
It seems like Abbott is discontinuing th.content: The only formula that my daughter can tolerate. Unfortunately it is nearly impossible to find in “ready to feed” bottles - I've had to drive nearly 80 miles to find the stuff. It seems like Abbott is discontinuing the RTF which would be very bad news as my daughter doesn't like the powder version.

Like many have stated, the formula is th.title: Highly recommend Similac for Spit Up!!
Like many have stated, the formula is th.content: We have 10 week old twins, who've had issues with 4 other kinds of formula!! Started them off with Similac Advance, and it didn't sit well with either of them. Their doctor said try Enfamil Nurtamigen ... that was the WORST formula, by far!! Not just the smell was bad, but it tore their tummies up!!! From there, we were told try Similac Alimentum, it was better than the Nurtamigen, but they were still having issues with diarrhea and spitting up. We decided we don't need to visit the doctor, to try a new formula, so we went with the Similac Soy. It was okay, but the diarrhea was still there. Now we are solely on Similac for Spit Up, and it is amazing!!! Our girls haven't been more content, and neither have had diarrhea or spit up. Like many have stated, the formula is thicker, so using the Dr. Brown's nipple size 2 has been our best solution!! If we try to make the bottle by hand, it's a little foamy, but if you plan ahead, it all settles. For our regular bottle making, we use the Baby Brezza ... our bottles always come out perfect, and there isn't an issue with foam!!!

If we try to make the bottle by hand, it's a little foamy, but if you plan ahead, it all settles. For our regular bottle making, we use the Baby Brezza ... our bottles always come out perfect, and there isn't an issue with foam!!!

question: What is the expiration date?

I am relieved that he is not choking and.title: Works well
I am relieved that he is not choking and.content: My two month old son is fed on breast milk and formula; he has been diagnosed with GERD and has terrible problems with reflux and gas. The doctor took me off of dairy and we tried soy formula. The soy caused my son to become very mucusy and did not help the gas. We recently switched to Enfamil AR and have seen a significant difference. He does not spit up as much (but he still does spit up- if the baby truly has GERD the spit up will not stop completely) and he takes his bottles much better. I am relieved that he is not choking and pulling away from the bottle anymore. Some reviewers discussed constipation; we mix 2 oz of formula and combine it with 2 oz of breast milk. That seems to work for both the GERD and to avoid constipation. I am grateful we found this formula to supplement my son's feedings.

top_attributes.warnings: Warning: Do not use a microwave oven to warm formula. Serious burns may result. Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm. Once prepared infant formula can spoil quickly. Either feed immediately or cover and store in refrigerator at 35-40 degrees F. (2-4 degrees C.) for no longer than 24 hours. Do not use prepared formula if it is unrefrigerated for more than a total of 2 hours. Do not freeze prepared formula. After feeding begins use formula within one hour or discard.

top_qna: Taste of formula
Great question! Our Enfamil A.R. has a slight cooked milk taste compared to the strong bitter taste that comes with our Enfamil Gentlease. - Amber Enfamil Expert 6/18/2019

I purchased this at the at the beginning.title: Product expires quickly
I purchased this at the at the beginning.content: I purchased this at the at the beginning of this month and received it a week later. I ordered a few cases and when I looked at the bottle they expire at the beginning of August!!! I bought these to have on hand for outings. I will have to use these very quickly which totally defeats the purpose. This product is already very expensive and now I have just spent unnecessary money on a product that I cannot use the way I intended it to be used. I'm a single mother and have limited money as is. Very disappointed.

But is a life savor!.title: Amazing, but a bit to expensive
But is a life savor!.content: My son was previously breastfed, but my supply went down and had to switch to formula. First I tried, Gentle, but he just puked everything up. Then we switched to soy, same thing. even added rice to help weigh it down. Doctors thought it was just Acid reflex. So started him on meds, even that wouldn't help. He kept loosing weight, in and out of the doctors. Then we found Nutramigen Hypoallergenic, and started him on that. Worked perfectly, he's finally keeping stuff down, and even taken off the acid reflex meds! and now gaining weight perfectly! But, down side its a bit expensive, my son eats a lot. so I go threw a can in 3 days, and being a single mother, it makes everything tight. But is a life savor!

top_attributes.warnings: Do not use a microwave oven to warm formula. Serious burns may result. Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm. Opened cans And prepared formula can spoil quickly. Either feed immediately or cover And store in refrigerator at 35-40 f (2-4 c) for no longer than 48 hours. Do not use opened can And/or prepared formula if they are unrefrigerated for more than a total of 2 hours. Do not freeze prepared formula. After feeding begins do not refrigerate feeding bottle. You must use within 1 hour or discard.

top_attributes.food_storage_tips: Your baby's health depends on carefully following the instructions below. Proper hygiene preparations dilution use and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Use as directed by your baby's doctor. Ask your baby's doctor about the need to use cooled boiled water for mixing and the need to boil clean utensils bottles and nipples in water before use.

top_attributes.food_preparation_tips: Store unopened cans at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat. Do not freeze. Nutramigen lipil does not look or taste like milk or soy formulas. It may separate in the refrigerator. Shake well before feeding.

top_attributes.ingredients: Water (75%) corn syrup solids (10%) vegetable oil (palm olein soy coconut and high oleic sunflower oils) (7%) casein hydrolysate* (milk) (4%) modified corn starch (3%) and less than 1%: Mortierella alpina oil† Crypthecodinium cohnii oil‡ acetylated monoglycerides carrageenan vitamin A palmitate vitamin D3 vitamin E acetate vitamin K1 thiamin hydrochloride riboflavin vitamin B6 hydrochloride vitamin B12 niacinamide folic acid calcium pantothenate biotin ascorbic acid choline chloride inositol calcium carbonate calcium phosphate magnesium oxide ferrous sulfate zinc sulfate manganese sulfate cupric sulfate sodium iodide sodium selenite sodium citrate potassium citrate potassium chloride citric acid taurine L-cystine L-tyrosine L-tryptophan L-carnitine.* Modified to be better tolerated in milk-allergic babies.† A source of arachidonic acid (ARA).‡ A source of docosahexaenoic acid (DHA).

top_attributes.product_short_description: Enfamil Nutramigen is a hypoallergenic formula proven to manage colic fast often within 48 hours. If your baby has an allergy to the cow's milk protein in infant formula Nutramigen contains both extensively hydrolyzed protein to manage colic fast. These two ingredients offer a more comprehensive approach working together to help babies feel better faster. The benefits of these two ingredients include: Hypoallergenic easy-to-digest proteins proven to promote skin health in infants through 18 months of age proven to promote digestive system health within 1 week of use effectively manages colic in 48 hours promotes immune system balance.†Studied before the addition of DHA and ARA.*Enfamil is the #1 pediatrician recommended brand of Infant Formula - QuintilesIMS using the ProVoice Survey fielded from October 1 2016 to September 30 2017.

top_attributes.product_medium_description:
• Hypoallergenic and extensively broken-down proteins
  • Manages colic due to cow’s milk allergy
  • Number one infant formula brand for colic due to cow’s milk protein allergy

top_attributes.shelf_description:
<ul><li>0 - 12 Months.</li>
<li>For Cow's Milk Allergy.</li>

top_qna: So is the picture wrong or your description? Picture says concentrate must add water. Description says ready to use.
Hello Sling! Thank you for taking the time to contact us. We are looking into this issue and it should be updated soon. Thank you for choosing Nutramigen! -Ashley
This product says it is 13 fl oz but that you must add water. How many oz will you eventually get from this container?
There is no need to add water. This canister holds 13 ounces.

He kept loosing weight, in and out of the doctors. Then we found Nutramigen Hypoallergenic, and started him on that. Worked perfectly, he's finally keeping stuff down, and even taken off the acid reflex meds! and now gaining weight perfectly! But, down side its a bit expensive, my son eats a lot. so I go threw a can in 3 days, and being a single mother, it makes everything tight. But is a life savor!

top_attributes.warnings: Do not use a microwave oven to warm formula. Serious burns may result. Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm. Opened cans And prepared formula can spoil quickly. Either feed immediately or cover And store in refrigerator at 35-40 f (2-4 c) for no longer than 48 hours. Do not use opened can And/or prepared formula if they are unrefrigerated for more than a total of 2 hours. Do not freeze prepared formula. After feeding begins do not refrigerate feeding bottle. You must use within 1 hour or discard.

top_attributes.food_storage_tips: Your baby's health depends on carefully following the instructions below. Proper hygiene preparations dilution use and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Use as directed by your baby's doctor. Ask your baby's doctor about the need to use cooled boiled water for mixing and the need to boil clean utensils bottles and nipples in water before use.

top_attributes.food_preparation_tips: Store unopened cans at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat. Do not freeze. Nutramigen lipil does not look or taste like milk or soy formulas. It may separate in the refrigerator. Shake well before feeding.

How many ounces of formula does this size can make?

One 22.2 ounce tub of Enfamil - Premium Powder Infant Formula contains 629 g of powder. 8.8 g powder makes 2 ounces of formula so 629 g powder makes 143 ounces of formula (629 / 8.8 = 71.48 x 2 = 142.95).
is this formula for babies with digestive problems
Enfamil Gentlease is the kind for digestive issues. Enfamil AR is the one with added rice starch for acid reflux type issues. Consult your dr first in which to give.
Exp dates vary!

I do not believe that this formula is for babies with digestive problems. Though we had tried many different brands of formula and this is the one that was the gentlest on my baby's stomach. I would look into the specialized formulas that both Enfamil & Similac make. I remember seeing some for babies with spit up and digestive problems.

It says 4 pack of 35 oz how much is the total amount ?

It contains two foil bags only. each foil bag weighs 1.04 lb (which is barely over 16 oz) so the total weight of the box contents is 33.2 oz (2.08 lb) which based on the directions will make a total 237 oz of formula. it contains a small scoop that you must use to make sure you get the dilution rate correct. top_qna: How long Intake period or Shelf Life ?

Hello! The primary factors that limit shelf life are physical stability such as color and the natural gradual decrease in the potency of some of the vitamins. The shelf life is chosen to assure that the vitamins in our products will routinely meet the label claims until the Expiration or Use By date. Products are shipped from our warehouse with sufficient shelf life remaining to allow for normal movement through distribution channels. To ensure the highest quality product the shelf life of our products is reviewed on an ongoing basis. Consequently the shelf life for a specific product may vary from batch to batch and we are unable to provide a date. Please refer to the Use By or Expiration date printed on each product package to determine the remaining time available for use. Thank you for choosing Enfamil Infant! -Ashley
How many oz does a single packet make?
Hello! Enfamil Infant comes in Single-Serve Powder Packets containing pre-measured infant formula to be mixed with 4oz of water. I hope that this is helpful! -Ashley

Unique Triple Health Guard Blend

Enfamil Infant Premium is tailored to meet the complete nutritional needs for your baby and help support their early milestones. This infant formula provides complete nutrition for babies 0-12 months of age.

Enfamil Infant Premium has our unique triple health guard blend to help support your baby?s brain nutrient intake and immune health. Find out why Enfamil is the #1 brand recommended by pediatricians.**

Supports Brain Health and Cognitive Development

This baby formula has both the amount of brain nourishing inositol and DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid) found in breast milk?. It has twice the Omega-3 DHA as the other leading brand?.

DHA is a special brain-building omega-3 fatty acid that has long term benefits for a growing child. The following effects have been found in babies fed formulas with DHA compared to those who weren?t:

  • Better Attention
  • Better verbal skills
  • Better mental development
  • Better executive function

This milk formula is easy to digest and has ARA (Arachidonic Acid) which is a nutrient believed to support brain and eye development.

Supports Immune Health and Growth

In total this baby milk formula has 30 key nutrients that help support growth. Plus it has two prebiotics that support your baby?s immune health.

As your baby starts crawling and becoming more active immune system support is important. Prebiotics feed the good bacteria found naturally in the digestive tract ? where 70% of your infant's immune system is located. Emerging science suggests prebiotics may support your baby's developing immune system. Enfamil PREMIUM Infant has a dual prebiotic blend designed to work throughout the digestive tract for more complete support compared to our previous formula.

Enfamil Infant is kosher and has no artificial flavors colors or sweeteners. It is made with non-genetically modified organisms (GMOs)* so you can make informed decisions when feeding your baby.

Formula Feeding Facts

Some fussy babies have difficulty breastfeeding but formula feeding with Enfamil can provide the nutrition they need. Over half of moms report they experienced a feeding issue with their infant in the first year so you?re not alone.

There?s an Enfamil formula for every baby! Try Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease our sensitivity formula for a gentle protein blend gassy babies.

*Not made with genetically engineered ingredients but trace amounts of genetically engineered material may be present in the product from manufacturing environments and process sources.
**Among pediatricians recommending a brand.
?The average worldwide levels in mature breast milk over the course of lactation of inositol: 22 mg/100kcal; and DHA: 0.32% of total fatty acids.
?Enfamil has not been shown superior to Similac Pro-Advance in nourishing the brain. Enfamil DHA = 0.32% of total fatty acids; Similac DHA = 0.15% of total fatty acids. Expert recommended level of DHA is 0.2%-0.5% of total fatty acids. Enfamil has not been shown superior to the other leading brand in supporting infant's brain and immune system development.

top_qna: So one quart equals 32 ounces true so this offer has six cans at thirty-two ounces..in each can? Is it liquid or powdered formula?
It is one can and they do not send the other five cans to complete the order....

For those of you that were skeptical about this offer like myself I decided to purchase one order to see if I would receive 1 can or all 6 like advertised. I received it the very next day and sure enough I only received 1 can. I was going to let it go as wrong info on advertisment but my purchase summary did show a complete order for 6 cans at 7.18 as well as an email confirmation stating a 6 pk as well. So I did call their customer service and I thought I was going to have to argue my point ( I thought they would tell me come on who really expects 6 32oz ready to serve formula for $7.18 ) but nope with out hassle andno questions asked they had another shipment of 6 cans sent out to me without charge :) I'm a satisfied customer and will order again and hope my next purchases are of the complete 6 pk. 1 32oz can is enough for my 8 month old son in one day as he eats baby foods/cereal as well. Thank you Wal-Mart :)

Once prepared infant formula can spoil quickly.  Either feed immediately or cover and store in refrigerator at 35-40F (2-4C) for no longer than 24 hours.  Do not use prepared formula if it is unrefrigerated for more than a total of 2 hours.  Do not freeze prepared formula.  After feeding begins use formula within one hour or discard.  Powder Storage:  We recommend that the powder be kept inside the pouch in the Enfamil Newborn tub.  If instead you empty the pouch into the tub you must first wash and dry the tub and retain the batch code and "use by" date.  Store tub at room temperature.  Use with Enfamil Newborn formula only.  Keep product fresh and prevent bacterial growth by keeping tub completely clean and dry and not using it for preparing formula.  After opening pouch keep tub and pouch tightly closed store in a dry area and use contents within 1 month.  Do not freeze powder and avoid excessive heat.

top_qna: What is 'prebiotics?'
Prebiotics feed the good bacteria found naturally in the digestive tract.

Hello Pam and good question! Prebiotics are non-digestible food ingredients –typically a type of carbohydrates - that benefit the body by selectively stimulating the growth and/or activity of one or a limited number of bacteria in the colon. Prebiotics support growth of beneficial gut bacteria that may help support a baby's immune system. Babies fed infant formula having prebiotics may have softer stools more like those of a breastfed baby. I hope that this helps! -Ashley

I tried the Enfamil Newborn and after th.title: Works Like a Charm!!!
I tried the Enfamil Newborn and after th.content: This is my third baby. With my first I used Enfamil with Lipil and it was great. My second I Breastfed and because I never produce a lot of milk I used Similac and really liked it. With this baby I also breastfed and used the Similac, however my baby was so gassy and uncomfortable I decided to switch formula. I switched to Enfamil Gentlease and although she got better gas wise she became constipated if I didn't mix it with the breast milk which also caused her pain. I recently stopped pumping so I decided I had to switch again since I didn't want her to be always constipated. I tried the Enfamil Newborn and after three days she is finally pooping regularly AND more importantly it is the same consistency as when she drinks the breast milk. She no longer looks like she is straining to poop. Also the smell of the poop smells just like when she drank the breast milk. I AM LOVING IT. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because it has only been about four days. My baby is 10 weeks old and I intend to use it until she is 16 weeks old then I will switch to Premium Lipil. Also some complained about the new packaging but it hasn't been a problem for me. I just pour the contents of the bag into the tub and we are good to go. Although I do think that the Similac container is a bit easier and sturdier.

The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because it has only been about four days. My baby is 10 weeks old and I intend to use it until she is 16 weeks old then I will switch to Premium Lipil. Also some complained about the new packaging but it hasn't been a problem for me. I just pour the contents of the bag into the tub and we are good to go. Although I do think that the Similac container is a bit easier and sturdier.

top_qna: Where do you get the baby bottle nipples at??

They are the regular caps and nipples that you buy in the baby aisle by the bottles at Walmart or any other store. You don't have to use any special nipples or bottle caps. The nipples come 2 to 3 in a package stated for the age of the babie. Infant nipples have smaller holes in them and they get larger as the child grows older.

Hello Malia! Our Nursette bottles require a nipple that will fit over a threaded bottle width of approximately 1 1/2". Many standard or classic nipples available at retail will fit our Nursette bottles. Thank you for choosing Enfamil Newborn! -Ashley
Since it does not come with the nipples will the nipple from a a regular size bottle fit?

Our Nursette bottles require a nipple that will fit over a threaded bottle width of approximately 1 1/2". Many standard or classic nipples available at retail will fit these Nursette bottles. I hope that this is helpful! -Ashley

top_attributes.food_preparation_tips: The baby?s health depends on carefully following the instructions below. Use only as directed by a medical professional.Proper hygiene preparation dilution use and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Powdered infant formulas are not sterile and shouldnotbe fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and supervised by a doctor. Discuss with the doctor which formula is appropriate for the baby. Discuss with your baby's doctor whether you need to use cooled boiled water for mixing and whether they need to boil clean utensils bottles and nipples in water before use. 1) Wash hands thoroughly with soap and water before preparing formula. 2) Pour desired amount of water into bottle. Add powder. 3) Cap bottle and SHAKE WELL. Use the charts below for correct amounts of water and powder. Use scoop in tub or can to measure powder. Store DRY scoop in lid holder in tub or in can.

top_qna: how much infamil "infant" powder to mix for 4 oz feeding

Thank you for choosing Gentlease for the little one in your life! For mixing add 1 unpacked level scoop of Enfamil Gentlease Powder to 2 fluid ounces of water. For 4 ounces you will use 2 unpacked level scoops. I hope that this is helpful! -Ashley
2 scoops of powder to 4oz water

top_attributes.warnings: Do not use a microwave oven to warm formula. Serious burns may result. Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm. Opened bottles and prepared formula can spoil quickly. Either feed immediately or cover and store in refrigerator at 35-40 degrees F (2-4 degrees C) for no longer than 48 hours. Do not use opened bottle and/or prepared formula if they are unrefrigerated for more than a total of 2 hours. Do not freeze prepared bottle. After feeding begins use formula within one hour or discard.Contains milk and soy.Do not use if protective seal around cap or if foil seal under cap is damaged or missing.

I stir the formula with a small whisk or.title: Best Way to Mix it...
I stir the formula with a small whisk or.content: I started using this product due to my 2 month old daughter spitting up immediately after every feeding and vomiting frequently after first week of introducing formula. Many people complained of the bubbles and froth that's created when shaking it. I stir the formula with a small whisk or dough hook (attachment from my hand mixer)It reduces the bubbles and makes the formula smooth and it doesn't clog. Also if you prepare the formula ahead of time and then refrigerate it and then pour what you need in a bottle you will eliminate clumping & bubbles, but you will have to warm the formula. I even use this formula along with the Dr Brown's bottles. No matter what formula or bottle you use if your baby is smacking when eating they are taking in air and will spit up remember to burp them frequently during their feeding not just afterward. And listen to them while they eat...to check for proper feeding on the bottle. Give this formula a chance. It is much better for your little one and easier to digest than adding cereal to any formula. Good luck & Happy Feeding!!!

top_attributes.product_short_description:
Enfamil PREMIUM Infant Formula Ready to Use Liquid 8 fl oz 15 Bottles: Enfamil Infant Premium is a baby formula tailored to meet the nutritional needs of infants 0-12 months. Unique Triple Health Guard blend that has 30 nutrients for growth DHA for brain development and Vitamins for Immune Health. Ingredients are not genetically engineered.

Unique Triple Health Guard Blend: Enfamil Infant Premium is tailored to meet the complete nutritional needs for your baby and help support their early milestones. This infant formula provides complete nutrition for babies 0-12 months of age.

Enfamil Infant Premium has our unique triple health guard blend to help support your baby's brain nutrient intake and immune health. Find out why Enfamil is the #1 brand recommended by pediatricians.

Supports Brain Health and Cognitive Development: This baby formula has both the amount of brain nourishing inositol and DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid) found in breast milk. It has twice the Omega-3 DHA as the other leading brand.

DHA is a special brain-building omega-3 fatty acid that has long term benefits for a growing child. The following effects have been found in babies fed formulas with DHA compared to those who weren't: Better Attention Better verbal skills Better mental development Better executive function.

This milk formula is easy to digest and has ARA (Arachidonic Acid) which is a nutrient believed to support brain and eye development.

Supports Immune Health and Growth: In total this baby milk formula has 30 key nutrients that help support growth. Plus it has two prebiotics that support your baby's immune health.

As your baby starts crawling and becoming more active immune system support is important. Prebiotics feed the good bacteria found naturally in the digestive tract where 70% of your infant's immune system is located. Emerging science suggests prebiotics may support your baby's developing immune system. Enfamil PREMIUM Infant has a dual prebiotic blend designed to work throughout the digestive tract for more complete support compared to our previous formula.

Enfamil Infant is kosher and has no artificial flavors colors or sweeteners. It is made with non-genetically modified organisms (GMOs) so you can make informed decisions when feeding your baby.

Formula Feeding Facts: Some fussy babies have difficulty breastfeeding but formula feeding with Enfamil can provide the nutrition they need. Over half of moms report they experienced a feeding issue with their infant in the first year so you're not alone. There's an Enfamil formula for every baby! Try Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease our sensitivity formula for a gentle protein blend gassy babies.

Not made with genetically engineered ingredients but trace amounts of genetically engineered material may be present in the product from manufacturing environments and process sources.

Among pediatricians recommending a brand. The average worldwide levels in mature breast milk over the course of lactation of inositol: 22 mg/100kcal; and DHA: 0.32% of total fatty acids.

Enfamil has not been shown superior to Similac Pro-Advance in nourishing the brain. Enfamil DHA = 0.32% of total fatty acids; Similac DHA = 0.15% of total fatty acids. Expert recommended level of DHA is 0.2%-0.5% of total fatty acids. Enfamil has not been shown superior to the other leading brand in supporting infant's brain and immune system development.

top_qna: What is the expiration date

Great Question Valerie! Before our products are released for distribution stability tests are performed to determine the expected shelf life of that product. The results of these tests form the basis for establishing the Expiration (EXP) or Use By date. The shelf life and Expiration (EXP) or Use By dates are based on normal conditions of storage and distribution. The primary factors that limit shelf life are physical stability such as color and the natural gradual decrease in the potency of some of the vitamins. The shelf life is chosen to assure that the vitamins in our products will routinely meet the label claims until the Expiration or Use By date. Products are shipped from our warehouse with sufficient shelf life remaining to allow for normal movement through distribution channels. We must rely on store personnel to stock their shelves and periodically review the Expiration (EXP) or Use By dates on products. I hope this helps! ~Cindi
How many bottles does the 21.5 oz. reusable container make?

When prepared according to label directions the 21.5 ounce powder tub of Enfamil PREMIUM Gentlease will yield approximately 156 fluid ounces of prepared formula. I hope this information is helpful! ~Nora

This pediatrician-recommended formula is fortified with vitamins and minerals for immune health.

top_attributes.warnings: Do not use a microwave oven to warm formula. Serious burns may result. Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm. Do not use prepared formula if it is unrefrigerated for more than a total of 2 hours. Do not freeze prepared formula. After feeding begins use formula within one hour or discard.

The only thing I would like to see diffe.title: Baby finally not spitting up!
The only thing I would like to see diffe.content: I received a free sample of this through PINCHme and i loved it! So much that this is only brand we use now. I mostly breastfeed but recently my supply has dropped so we've started supplementing and every other brand i tried made my little man spit up A LOT, and a few made him constipated. Gerber solved our problems!! It breaks down easier in his tiny little belly and I can finally sleep without waking up every time he makes a noise because I'm worried that he spit up again. The only thing I would like to see different is the size of the "ready to feed" containers. They would be super convenient if we fed him just formula but since he's so used to breastmilk he won't eat formula by itself and i have to mix it with breastmilk, but we only do that forhis nighttime feedings so we end up wasting some with these. I would love to see an option of like 2-3oz ready to feed bottles. But all in all this is a great product and we are so grateful!

top_attributes.food_preparation_tips: Directions for Preparation and Use: Warning: Your baby's health depends on carefully following the preparation use and storage instructions below. Failure to follow these instructions could result in sever harm. Talk to (or consult) your baby's doctor about the appropriate formula for your baby. Powdered infant formulas are not sterile and should not be fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and supervised by your baby's doctor. Always wash your hands and utensils before preparing formula. Sterilization or boiling of tap or bottled water and sterilization of utensils is recommended. Your doctor will advise if it is not required. If boiling water bring to a rolling boil for 1 minute and allow to cool to room temperature before preparing formula. Step 1 Pour desired amount of water into bottle. Step 2 Add 1 unpacked level scoop (8.9g) of powder for each 2 fl. oz. of water (Only use enclosed scoop.) Step 3 Cap bottle; Shake well. Feed baby immediately. Once feeding begins use contents within 1 hour or discard. Makes approximately 164 fl. oz. (1.3 gal) of formula. Warming formula above or using water warmer than 100°F (38°C) will compromise the probiotic cultures.

top_qna: How to prepare!
6 oz= 3 scoops

My baby is 3 months old I usually feed him five ounces or so at a time roughly every 3 hours and he sleeps through the night pretty much already. This size can lasts us about 6 days. I just put five ounces of water in the bottle then add two and a half scoops and shake really really good swirl the bottle at the end to pop as many bubbles as possible and then let it sit for a minute or two. Your supposed to burp between every ounce but my baby pitches way to much of a fit and I burp every two ounces then for the last ounce. This formula is amazing for my little one hope it works well for you!

I've been giving my 4 month old this for.title: Not for my son
I've been giving my 4 month old this for.content: I've been giving my 4 month old this formula because it's the one that was given to him at the hospital from the beginning. Two weeks in, he started having a lot of spit up as well as grunting and non stop moving and arching his back at every feeding. I was told this was "normal" by his doctor and that I shouldn't worry as long as he was gaining weight. My son is still on this formula, per doctor's advice and now he's having bowel movement problems on top of the frequent large amounts of spit up at almost every feeding. He goes once every 3-4 days and I always have to assist him by opening his diaper and moving his legs for him in a bicycle motion because his stools are solid and enormous to the point that he can't go unless I do that. I've been looking at other formulas on here, but don't know which one to choose instead of this one. top_attributes.food_preparation_tips: Directions for Preparations and UseUse as directed by a doctor.Your baby's health depends on carefully following these directions. Proper hygiene handling and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Failure to follow these directions could result in severe harm. Ask your baby's doctor if you need to use cooled boiled water for mixing and if you need to boil (sterilize) bottles nipples and rings before use.1. Wash your hands surfaces and utensils. Pour water into clean bottle (see mixing guide).2. Add 1 unpacked level scoop (8.2g) to each 2 fl. oz. of water. Return dry scoop to can.3. Cap bottle; shake well; attach nipple. Once feeding begins use within 1 hour or discard.Measure water + Add scoop(s) of unpacked level powder using enclosed scoop. = Finished bottle (approx.)2 fl. oz. + 1 Scoop (8.2g) = 2 fl. oz.4 fl. oz. + 2 Scoops = 4 fl. oz.6 fl. oz. + 3 Scoops = 6 fl. oz.8 fl. oz. + 4 Scoops = 8 fl. oz.Pour prepared formula into feeding bottle cap and store in refrigerator.1 can = 59 4 fl. oz. bottles. When mixed as directed makes approx. 237 fl. oz. of formula.

What a waste..title: Beware allergic reaction from this product
What a waste..content: We have been supplementing with Similac Pro-Advance ready-to-feed with our newborn and that product worked well. We decided to give this powder variation a try since it was more easily available. After eating about 60 ml, our baby immediately got red splotches under her eyes and appeared to have an allergic reaction. She was also gassy and couldn't sleep. What a waste. Maybe we'll give it another a try down the line, but for now it's just ready-to-feed for our girl.

top_qna: What are the differences in formulation between this and the ones in the blue box?

Similac For Supplementation has about 10 percent more galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS) than Similac Advance. GOS helps to soften stools so they will be more like those of a breast fed baby. Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team
If I use one ounce can I refrigerate the other ounce?

Great question Paola! Once the 2 fl oz bottle has been opened and poured into your baby’s clean bottles both the formula in your baby’s bottles and any left in the 2 fl oz bottle should be refrigerated immediately and used within 2 days. Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team
Do the 2oz ready feed Similiac formula bottles come with nipples?

Each box of 8 bottles comes with 1 nipple. But most other nipples fit these bottles specifically the ones I use with them are Medela. My baby is used to them and likes those nipples better so I just use my own.
The Similac For Supplementation Infant formula packs comes with 8 2oz ready to feed bottles and 1 nipple and ring.
It comes with one sealed sterile nipple.
Each box contains 1 nipple.
Can this formula be used after a mother stops breastfeeding? Does it have the same benefits as other formulas?

Similac For Supplementation is a nutritionally complete formula for breastfeeding Moms who choose to introduce formula. It can be used anytime for babies between 0-12 months and can be used as the only feeding choice. Hope this helps! ~The Similac Team

This is the only formula that my daughte.title: Works wonders! Thank God for WIC!!
This is the only formula that my daughte.content: This is the only formula that my daughter could use

We have then switched to similac aliment.title: So far so good
We have then switched to similac aliment.content: My three week old was on similac pro advance since birth with a few breastmilk bottles a day. We notice she was extremely fussy and could not pass gas nor poop. Then once I completely stop breastfeeding and fully on formula we noticed a rash starting to appear. After a week on full formula (similac pro advance) we took her to the doctor and we were told she has a cows milk allergy. We have then switched to similac alimentum and the rash is completely gone and fussiness is minimal, but not she is spitting up after drinking her bottle and being burped multiple times.

The allergy symptoms have stopped (we go.title: Only formula that helped my baby with allergies
The allergy symptoms have stopped (we go.content: I breastfed my son since birth, but he started to show signs of allergies around 4 weeks - blood in his diapers and a rash. Long story short, after nearly 5 months of trial and error I was on a dairy-free/nut-free/egg-free/soy-free/gluten-free/corn-free diet in order to keep breastfeeding. None of that worked.My doctor finally recommended Alimentum ready-to-feed (because the powder version has corn) and now my son loves his bottles. The allergy symptoms have stopped (we go back to the doctor soon to confirm) and he is a happy growing baby.My insurance even covers the cost! (after a 4-6 week wait for reimbursement)Overall, don't let the price scare you away. This might be the perfect formula for your baby!

None of that worked.My doctor finally re.content: I breastfed my son since birth, but he started to show signs of allergies around 4 weeks - blood in his diapers and a rash. Long story short, after nearly 5 months of trial and error I was on a dairy-free/nut-free/egg-free/soy-free/gluten-free/corn-free diet in order to keep breastfeeding. None of that worked.My doctor finally recommended Alimentum ready-to-feed (because the powder version has corn) and now my son loves his bottles. The allergy symptoms have stopped (we go back to the doctor soon to confirm) and he is a happy growing baby.My insurance even covers the cost! (after a 4-6 week wait for reimbursement)Overall, don't let the price scare you away. This might be the perfect formula for your baby!

After a week on full formula (similac pro advance) we took her to the doctor and we were told she has a cows milk allergy. We have then switched to similac alimentum and the rash is completely gone and fussiness is minimal, but not she is spitting up after drinking her bottle and being burped multiple times.

top_attributes.product_medium_description: Similac Expert Care Alimentum Formula is easy for sensitive tummies to digest. Its protein is broken down into tiny pieces to virtually eliminate allergic reactions in most babies who are allergic to the protein found in cow's milk. Produced by America's #1 baby formula brand* this infant powder formula is designed for babies up to a year old. If your baby's digestive system is especially sensitive and requires an extra-gentle baby formula ask your physician about this top product. This Similac powder formula comes in a 1-lb can. It is especially handy for busy mothers as you can mix this formula by simply adding water. A single packet of Similac Expert Care Alimentum Formula creates 115 fl oz of formula for your child.

top_qna: Why did the can size and scoop size change for the alimentum formula? And did the formula itself change?

Due to changes to the manufacturing process the powder is now fluffier and lighter and a larger scoop is needed to deliver the same weight of powder. The powder also takes up more room in the can and as a result less powder (by weight) fits into the same size can. Please know our Similac Team is exploring value options to help families and we encourage parents to enroll in our Similac StrongMoms program where they can receive special offers on Similac infant formulas (including Alimentum).
